She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Victoria dreams to be more successful in her business and hopes that her children will finish their studies. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members weekly to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional processed meat and frozen food needed for her business.

loans.name: Olga Marina

texts.es:
Olga Marina tiene 32 años de edad, es ama de casa y caficultora casada que en compañía de su esposo y sus hijos trabajan la agricultura para poder generar ingresos para su hogar. Ella por la falta de dinero no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar ya que desciende de una familia económicamente humilde. Su esposo la apoya en las diferentes actividades del campo ya que juntos tienen una gran experiencia en la caficultura pues por parte de ambas familias es una vocación siendo sus padres quienes les apoyaran y les enseñaran las técnicas para cultivar café. Una de las dificultades que ella identifica es la alza de los precios de los insumos que ella utiliza para asistir sus cultivos agregando a esto el acarreo de los mismos siendo este un costo difícil de minorar ya que la competencia no es un problema.
Por lo que hoy en día ella solicita financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes, abono, formula cafetalera, urea, insecticida entre otros, los cuales son necesarios para la protección y mantenimiento de sus cultivos de café de las diferentes plagas que conlleven al deterioro de la planta en general.
Sus planes a futuro son los de seguir incrementando sus cultivos de café mediante la compra de más tierra fortaleciendo el patrimonio para sus hijos y su familia mejorando la calidad de vida y apoyando a sus hijos en sus estudios dando la oportunidad de que puedan superarse y estudiar universitaria mente.
texts.en:
Olga Marina is 32 years old, married, and is a housewife and coffee grower. Along with her husband and children she works in agriculture, enabling them to generate income for their household. Because of lack of money she didn't have the chance to go to school, as she comes from a family of modest means. 

Her husband helps her in the various farm activities, as together they have a great deal of experience in growing coffee. This because it is a livelihood for both of their families, and their parents will help them and teach them the techniques for growing coffee.

One of the difficulties she identifies is the rise in the prices of supplies that she uses to maintain their crops, adding to this the cost of transporting them, which is difficult to reduce. Competition is not a problem.

So today she is requesting a loan for the purchase of agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, manure, coffee-formulated fertilizer, urea, insecticide, and other items. These are necessary to protect and maintain their coffee plantation from the various pests that bring with them plant deterioration.  

Her plans for the future are to continue expanding her coffee plantings by buying more land; building up the legacy for her children and family, improving their quality of life, helping her children with their education and giving them the opportunity to excel and attend university.

loans.use: To buy agricultural supplies for maintaining her coffee plantation.

loans.name: Ludy Janeth

texts.es:
Ludy es una joven de 25 años de edad, luchadora, emprendedora, dinámica y con muchos ánimos y deseos de superarse en la vida. Ella es casada y madre de 2 hijos quienes estudian en la primaria en diferentes grados de educación, comerciante ya que se dedica a la venta de pollos, guayaba y granos básicos. Ella también es agricultora ya que a temprana edad aprendió a cultivar café, maíz y frijol en compañía de sus padres y sus hermanos por vocación familiar. Sus clientes son las pulperías, vecinos, familiares, amigos y comedores de la zona local donde es entregado el producto semanalmente en donde nada más se involucran ella, su esposo y su hermano. El terreno donde está su criadero de pollo es propio gracias a una herencia de sus padres ubicado a 10 kilómetros de la comunidad donde ella habita al cual se traslada en autobús urbano.
Como madre de familia sus metas apoyar a sus hijos en la educación, brindarles la oportunidad para que estudien a nivel universitario y puedan ser grandes profesionales en la vida. Para su negocio seguir ampliando más la producción de pollo, guayaba y café para poder cubrir la demanda insatisfecha que diariamente se le presenta y que en la actualidad no se da abasto.
Por lo que ella actualmente solicita apoyo financiero a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para la compra de concentrado para pollo inicial y final, trasportar el producto ya que su lugar de trabajo está alejado del lugar donde ella compra los insumos. De esta manera ella incrementara mediante la venta de las aves sus ingresos, reinvertirá en su criadero y fortalecerá las ventas de nuevos animales.
texts.en:
Ludy, 25, is a determined, enterprising, and dynamic young woman with a lot of spirit and desire to excel in life.  She's married and the mother of two children who are in different grades in elementary school.

Ludy's a merchant because she earns a living selling chickens, guava, and basic grains.  She's also a farmer because at a young age she learned to grow coffee, corn, and beans in the family business with her parents and siblings.  Her customers are the grocery stores, neighbors, family members, friends, and eateries in the local area where she delivers her products weekly.  Only she, her husband, and her sister are involved.  The land where she keeps her chicken coop is her own, thanks to an inheritance from her parents; it's located 10 kilometers from the community where she lives and she gets there on an urban bus.

As a mother her goals are to support her children in their studies and give them the opportunity to go to college and become great professionals in life.  Her business goals are to continue expanding her chicken, guava, and coffee production so she can cover the unmet demand she currently faces every day but can't keep up with.

This is why Ludy's currently requesting financial support from the COMIXMUL cooperative.  She's going to buy concentrated feed for young and old chickens to transport, because her workplace is far from where she buys the inputs.  This way she'll increase her income through the sale of the poultry and reinvest in her coop and strengthen sales of new animals.

loans.use: to buy and transport concentrated chicken feed

loans.name: William Alexis

texts.es: William de 25 años de edad es soltero y  reside en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar desde hace mucho tiempo. Él se trabaja como empleado en una empresa cercana a su localidad en la cual tiene 4 años de prestar sus servicios. William desea terminar de construir un cuarto dormitorio el cual no ha logrado terminar por falta de recursos económicos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, arena, cemento y hierro.
texts.en:
William is twenty-five years old.  He is single and has lived in his own house alongside his relatives for a long time.  He works as an employee at a local business close to his town; he has worked there for four years.  

William hopes to finish building a bedroom, which he has been unable to complete due to a lack of economic resources.  For these reasons, William has requested a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of bricks, sand, cement, and iron bars.

loans.use: to buy bricks, sand, cement, and iron bars to finish constructing a bedroom.

loans.name: Ahro

texts.ru: Ахро жизнерадостный и честный человек из Севера Таджикистана. Он родился в 1975 году. Ахро с детства помогал родителям по животноводству. Он трудился упорно и именно его труд стал в его жизни гарантом удачи. Ахро сегодня имеет свой собственный бизнес скотоводством. Он имеет хорошую возможность развевать свой бизнес, так как он живет в сельской местности. Ахро хочет увеличить свой оборотный капитал. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 долларов США для покупки скота. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Ahro was born in 1975 and is a cheerful, honest man from northern Tajikistan. He helped his parents with raising livestock when he was a child. He has always worked hard, and his hard work has brought him good luck. Ahro now has his own cattle business and has good opportunity for growth because he lives in a rural area. Ahro wants to increase his working capital and has asked for a loan of $2000 USD to purchase cattle. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle to increase working capital

loans.name: Mario Ericson

texts.es:
Mario agradece a los inversionistas por el préstamo y se siente contento por el apoyo brindado, él se alegro porque está viendo crecer su negocio por la ayuda de estos créditos, él continua dedicándose a la agricultura, a la ganadería y a la crianza de animales menores en la comunidad de Pilco - Grande, él en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más animales menores como cuyes y gallinas para hacerlos crecer y para luego venderlos en esta época navideña. 
(La comunidad de Pilco – Grande está ubicado en el distrito de Huayllabamba dentro de la provincia de Paucartambo en el  departamento de Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Mario is grateful to the Kiva lenders for his previous loan and is pleased with the support he was given. He is happy because he was able to grow his business with the help of these loans. He continues to engage in farming, cattle breeding, and raising small animals in the community of Pilco - Grande.

Mario is taking this opportunity to request another loan so that he can buy more small animals, such as guinea pigs and chickens, that he can raise and later sell during the Christmas season.

The community of Pilco - Grande is located in the District of Huayllabamba, which is in Paucartambo Province in the Department of Cusco, Peru.

loans.use: to buy more guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Marley Yurani

texts.es:
Ella es marley, en estos momentos esta estudiando contabilidad, escogió esta carrera porque ve que tiene una gran salida en el futuro porque es una carrera que es muy importante, la ilusión es que al terminar el técnico como auxiliar contable y luego seguir la carrera en una universidad para que cuando acabe pueda desempeñarse como contadora. Le gustaría también tener su propia empresa y escalar cada vez mas, también le gustaría en un futuro tener un buen empleo, para a si ayudar a la familia en todos los gastos que se les presente, puesto que los papas pagan el estudio de ella y otros dos hermanos, le gustaría que a si como ellos la han ayudado también colaborar en todo aquello que necesiten y pagarse ella misma la carrera.
Actualmente también se encuentra estudiando en grado once, lo que permite este técnico es que cuando ella se gradué tenga varias posibilidades de entrar a un buen trabajo, para que ella tenga una buena entrada de dinero, seguir pagando la carrera profesional y también le ayudara porque como contadora tiene buena salida para cualquier tipo de trabajo.
Escogió esta carrera, le pareció muy llamativa, por los beneficios que se obtienen y para salir mejor preparado del colegio y a si cuando ingrese a la universidad sera un poco menos difícil de entender las cosas, porque ella dice que sabiendo muchas cosas que aprendió en el instituto sera mas fácil entender todo y a si poder graduarse y desempeñar su carrera. 
En el segundo al que ingresa, espero le vaya muy bien para graduarse y luchar por lo que desea.
Le gustaría obtener ese beneficio de kiva ya que es muy necesario y también le ayuda bastante a los papas, puesto que el papa trabaja independiente y el le brinda el estudio al hermano, ya que el también inicia su carrera como contador publico en la universidad, ya que el no tiene ingresos el papa se lo brinda, y la hermana también estudia en el colegio, y también el papa paga todos los gastos que ella necesite y el estudio, mi mama es ama de casa, lo cual no gana nada, y por eso quiere desempeñar la carrera para poder brindarle a su familia la ayuda lo mas pronto posible. 

Gracias
texts.en:
This is Marley. She is currently studying accounting. She chose this career because she sees a great beginning for her future because it is a career of great importance. Her dream is to finish her training to be an accounting assistant and then to pursue a path in college so that she can become an accountant when she finishes. She also would like to have her own business and continue scaling it up. She'd also like in the future to have a good job so that she can help her family with all of their expenses since her parents have paid for her education as well as the education of her two siblings. She would like to help her parents as they have helped her and pay for her degree herself. 

Marley is also currently studying in the eleventh grade. She is studying this specialty so that she can have several chances for getting a good job when she graduates so that she can continue paying for training. That will be helpful for her because she could have a good start at any job as an accountant.

She chose this degree because it seemed very appealing for the benefits she could obtain by getting better prepared in school. When she enters college, it will be less difficult for her to understand things. She says that knowing the many things she learns in school will make it easier to understand everything to graduate and fulfill her career goals. Also, when she enters college, she hopes it will go well so she can graduate and work for what she wants. 

She would like to receive this Kiva loan because it is very necessary and also helps her parents since her father works independently and provides for her brother's studies. Her brother also began his career as a public accountant in college. His father does not have much income and Marley's sister is also studying in high school paid for by her father. Her mother is a homemaker and does not earn an income and, for this reason, Marley wants to carry out her work in this career as soon as possible to be able to help her family.

Thank you.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of tuition to study accounting.

loans.name: Maryam

texts.en:
Maryam is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her brother appears in the photo.

Maryam is an 18-year-old single lady from a small village near Deir Al-Balah city. She lives with her family in a simple house. Maryam's brother works in the public sector and earns a low income. Maryam studies Islamic origins, and she would like to finish her studies and take the BA degree to find a job and help with part of the family's expenses.

Maryam took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new laptop for her studies. By taking this loan, Maryam will be able to do her homework and write her reports easily.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for her studies

loans.name: Samia

texts.en:
Samia is a 19-year-old single lady from Dier Al-Balah city. She lives with her family in a simple house. Samia's father works in the public sector and earns a low income. This is the only source of income for the family. 

Samia studies office automation and secretarial. She would like to finish her studies and find a job to help with part of her family's expenses. Samia took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new laptop for her studies. By taking this loan, Samia will be able to do her homework and write her reports easily. 

Samia appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for her studies.

loans.name: Lis

texts.en:
Lis is 22 years old. She is single and resides with her mother in Takeo province, Cambodia. She has been working in a garment factory for more than two years, earning approximately $3 per day. Her mother is a rice farmer who makes an income of $1 daily. 

To improve her family’s finances, Lis is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase a tuk tuk (a motorcycle-based taxi) for her brother to run public transportation service. This purchase will help him generate more income for the family. In the future, she would like to run a grocery store and build a new house, if possible.

loans.use: to purchase a tuk tuk (a motorcycle-based taxi) for her husband to run a taxi service.

loans.name: Dara

texts.en:
Dara is a hardworking man who is 41 years of age. He is married and has been blessed with two children who live with him, and are attending local primary school. Dara works for the government as a small officer, and earns a decent income to raise his family. His wife, who carries out the duties at home to assure the state of well-being of the family, also helps him earn income by farming seasonal rice crops. 

Dara and his wife aim to enlarge their farming areas and increase their production so that they can provide their children with their basic necessities. That’s why Dara is asking for a loan in the sum of KHR 1,100,000 to buy a plot of land for farming purpose. With the loan support, he hopes that he will be able to make his business more productive and improve the income for the household.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land for farming purposes.

loans.name: Mern

texts.en:
Mern is 41 years of age, and a widowed mother of four children. Three of them are employed in various occupations and the other one is attending school. Mern lives with her children in her own settlement located in a rural village of Siem Reap province. Mern is a farmer and has been raising rice crops for nearly 17 years. 

At this time, Mern is asking for a loan of USD 450 to buy a used motorcycle for her household. In the previous time, her family members were experiencing difficulties in fulfilling their transport needs and her employed children have to pay for motor taxi service every day for commuting to their workplaces without having a household motorcycle. This purchase will allow them to reduce unnecessary expenses and save more for the family. Mern will highly appreciate the lenders support, and will be grateful to them for their help in collecting the needed loan.

loans.use: to buy a used motorcycle for her household.

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Mary Ann, 36 years of age, is married, and she and her husband are blessed with two children. 

She has owned and managed a retail store business in their village for almost fifteen years, and with this she is earning a net income of PHP 200 per day. Her profits are usually spent on purchasing hog feed for her hogs to generate additional income. 

Due to insufficient funds she would like to request a loan amounting to PHP 10,000 to purchase coffee, sugar, detergent, soap, noodles, rice, candies, and beverages. She is hoping that her requested loan will be immediately granted so that she can improve her business to earn more profits.

loans.use: To purchase coffee, sugar, detergent soap, noodles, rice, candies, and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to grow maize, sorghum and millet

loans.name: Flordeliz

texts.en:
Flordeliz is 61 years old. She is married and has ten children. With one child in school, Flordeliz works very hard to provide for them.

Flordeliz runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock, like shampoo, soap, soft drinks, etc., to sell.  Flordeliz has been in this business for 10 years.  In the future, Flordeliz would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock, like shampoo, soap, soft drinks, etc. to sell

loans.name: Betty Elena

texts.es: Betty  de 56 años de edad  tiene un pequeño almacén de variedades en su domicilio, ubicado al sur de la ciudad. Su experiencia comercial data de hace 20 años, cuando por necesidad de incrementar sus ingresos familiares, mediante su independencia económica, decidió emprender su propia aventura emprendedora, en la que hasta hoy continua trabajando y quiere hacer crecer. Ella vende de contado en un horario laboral desde las 9 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche, comprando en almacenes de mayoristas que le ofrecen mejores opciones. Sus clientes son fijos y ocasionales y cuenta con muchos referidos, que compran directa mete en su local ubicado en su propio domicilio. En temporadas como navidad y año nuevo, su mayor desafío es tener el suficiente dinero para invertir, e incrementar sus ventas y con ello sus utilidades, Esta es la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual invertirá en mercancías variadas de las que Mas rotan en su variedad, como juguetes, ropa, calzado y cosméticos. Con su credikiva, planea obtener éxito, porque hace la inversión en la temporada mas comercial del año, donde hay un buen flujo de efectivo circulante.
texts.en:
Betty is 56 years old and has a small variety store in her home, located in the south part of town.  She has 20 years’ experience in this business.  She began her entrepreneurial venture out of a need to increase the family income.  It continues and she wants to grow it.

She works from 9:00 am to 9:00 pm, buying from large suppliers who offer her better deals.  She has steady and occasional customers and she has many referrals who buy directly from her.  During seasons such as Christmas and new year, her main challenge is having enough money to invest and increase her sales.  She is asking for a her first Kiva loan, through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to buy merchandise such as toys, clothing, shoes, and  cosmetics.  She plans to be successful through her Kiva loan, because she is making this investment during the busiest time of the year, where there is a good amount of money in circulation.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Marta Alicia

texts.es: Marta, tiene 33 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo con quien tiene 5 hijos y reside en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Hace un años estableció su propio negocio de pulpería, donde vende granos básicos, azúcar, harina, sal, pan, huevos, churros, refrescos, lácteos, productos enlatados y de aseo. anteriormente trabajo en un maquila y luego de quedar sin empleo decidió poner este negocio. Ha solicitado un préstamo por 10,000 Lempiras para surtir la pulpería, con productos como granos básicos, harina, manteca, lácteos, refrescos, churros y otros que necesite, para poder aumentar las ventas. Tiene como meta ampliar mas  el negocio para surtirlo y obtener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Marta is 33 years old and lives in a common-law marriage with her husband with whom she has five children.  They live in the village of Choloma, Cortes. A few years ago she established her own business, a grocery store, where she sells staple grains, sugar, flour, salt, bread, eggs, chips, soft drinks, dairy products, canned goods, and toiletries.  She previously worked in a factory but when she was laid off she decided to start this business.

She has asked for a loan of 10,000 Lempiras to stock her shop with such items as staple grains, flour, lard, dairy products, soft drinks, chips, and other things she needs to increase her sales.  Her goal is to expand her business, restock it and increase her earnings.

loans.use: to stock her business with products such as staple grains, flour, lard, dairy products, soft drinks, chips, etc.

loans.name: José

texts.es:
José es cliente de Kubo Financiero y esta es su historia: 
José tiene 53 años, está casado desde hace 28 años y tiene 4 hijos.  Él tiene una herrería donde fabrica puertas, zaguanes y ventanas desde hace 15 años. 
Necesita el préstamo para comprar materia prima como lámina, ángulos, caramelo, cuadrado y tubo, ya que tiene varios pedidos en puerta que necesita atender y entregar puntualmente.  
Entre sus logros se encuentra haber logrado mantener su negocio durante estos 15 años y haber comprado su automóvil; pero principalmente, ser el sustento de su familia y haberles dado educación a sus hijos.  Su reto es continuar atendiendo a sus clientes con la puntualidad que lo ha caracterizado y seguir apoyando a su esposa e hijos.
texts.en:
José's a client of Kubo Financiero and this is his story:

José, 53, has been married for 28 years and has four children.  He has a metal shop where he has made doors and windows for 15 years.

He needs the loan to buy supplies such as metal sheeting, paint, braces, and tubing.  He has several requests for doors that he needs to make and deliver punctually.

One of José's achievements is having supported his business these 15 years and having bought a car.  His main achievement, though, is supporting his family and giving his children an education.  His challenge is to continue serving his customers with his characteristic punctuality and supporting his wife and children.

loans.use: to buy supplies

loans.name: Lydia Emperatriz

texts.es: Lydia de 65 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida, su hijo y sus nietos. Lydia se gana la vida mediante la elaboración y venta de tortillas las cuales son muy demandadas por sus vecinos. Ella habita en condiciones muy sencillas y con mucho esfuerzo va mejorando sus condiciones habiatacionales. Desea construir un cerco perimetral para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI dado que no cuenta con el capital para hacerlo por su cuenta. Con el monto solicitado comprará postes de cemento y rollos de alambre de púa. Espera poder contar con este apoyo y así comenzar lo antes posible con la construcción del cerco.
texts.en:
Lydia is sixty-five years old.  She lives in her own home together with her life partner, their son, and their grandchildren.  Lydia gets ahead in life by making and selling tortillas.  These goods are always in high demand in her neighborhood.  She lives in very humble conditions and has been improving her home through a lot of effort and determination.

She hopes to construct a perimeter wall.  This is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI.  She does not have capital to do this herself.

With the requested amount, she will buy cement wall posts and barbed wire.  She hopes to have this support and to thereby begin constructing the wall as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy cement fence posts and barbed wire in order to build a perimeter fence.

loans.name: Hisham

texts.en:
Hisham is a 20-year-old, single man from Deir Al-Balah city. He lives with his family in a simple house. Hisham's mother works in the public sector and earns a low income. This is the only source of income for the family. 

Hisham studies Nursing. He would like to finish his study, to find a job and help his family with part of the family's expenses.

Hisham took a USD loan from Palestine for Credit & Development (FATEN). This loan will help him to buy a new laptop for his studies. By taking this loan, he will be able to easily do his homework and write his reports. 

Hisham appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies.

loans.name: Family  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Family está formado por 7 socias y 1 socio quienes tienen objetivos en común el cual es mejorar la estabilidad de sus hogares con sus trabajos, son personas amables, gentiles que mantienen su cultura y tradiciones. Viven en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es reconocida por su belleza natural, arquitectónica y cultural, es cuna de grandes Deportistas, escritores y sobre todo de gente muy amable.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Betti, se encuentra realizando su primer crédito a lado de sus amigas y compañeras del grupo de crédito Family, fue invitada a este  grupo por su cuñada y espera con los créditos incrementar su negocio y aprender de cada una de sus amigas.
La Señora Betti tiene 38 años de edad, vive en unión libre y ha concebido 4 hijos de 20, 16, 12 y 8 años de edad, su primera hija estudia en la universidad y trabaja para solventar sus gastos, su segundo hijo está en el colegio y sus dos últimos hijos en la escuela, su esposo labora como albañil, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
Doña Betti para ayudarle a su esposo en los gastos del hogar, se dedica a la  preparación y venta de comida, lleva 3 años en el negocio y labora de domingo a domingo desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche. 
El dinero de su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de una vajilla, mesas, sillas y víveres. Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
The "Family" loan group has eight members - seven women and one man - who share a common objective: they want to improve their households' financial stability through their work.  The members are friendly and kind, and are maintaining their culture and traditions.  The group lives in the city of Cuenca, known for its natural, architectural, and cultural beauty.  It is the birthplace of great sportspeople, writers, and, above all, very friendly people.

One member of the group is Betti.  She is taking out her first loan, alongside her friend and fellow group members.  Betti was invited to join the group by her sister-in-law and she hopes that, with the loans, she can expand her business and learn from each of her friends.

Betti is 38 years old and has a partner. Together the couple has four children, aged 20, 16, 12, and 8 years old respctively.  The eldest is studying at university and working to cover her expenses; the other three are in school.  Betti's husband is a builder.  The couple does not own a house but rents instead.

In order to help her husband with household costs, Betti works making and selling meals.  She has had the business for three years, working seven days a week, from 8am until 8pm.  Betti will invest this loan in crockery, tables, chairs, and supplies.  Her dream is to have her own house.

loans.use: to buy crockery, tables, chairs, and supplies.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: Doña Yolanda de 63 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos quienes trabajan y le ayudan en los gastos del hogar, ella se dedica a la venta de refrescos, gaseosas, jugos, agua, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el parque que se encuentra cerca de su casa, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de sus hijos logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Doña Yolanda esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su unica fuente de trabajo y asi poder junto a sus dos hijos tener una mejor calidad de vida sin limitaciones algunas.
texts.en: Doña Yolanda, 63, and her two grown children live in a house that she owns.  Her children work and share household expenses.  Doña Yolanda operates a drinks sales business.  She sells water, soft drinks and juices at a spot in a local park.  Her income from the business and her children's incomes are enough to cover their combined expenses.  Doña Yolanda is applying for a loan that she will use to buy wholesale supplies of merchandise for carrying on her business.  The business is her only means of supporting herself and the investment will help her to build a better life.

loans.use: to stock her drinks sales business.

loans.name: Darwin Eliezar

texts.es: Darwin de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, el se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años junto a su padre, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Darwin esta solicitando un credito para la compra de una lampara salvasol que es una lampara de carga con energia de paneles solares, dirigida principalmente a hogares del area rural que carecen de conexion de energia electrica, por esa razon esta solicitando el credito y poder comprar dicha lampara que muestra en la fotografia.
texts.en: Darwin, 36, lives with his wife and three children in a house that he owns.  He has operated a farming business with his father for several years and his income from the business covers the family's everyday expenses.  Darwin is applying for a loan that he will use to buy a solar-powered lamp.  The lamps are designed for parts of the country that have no electric service and can be charged by solar power.  Darwin is holding one of the lamps in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar-powered lamp.

loans.name: Robertha Lisseth

texts.es: Robertha Lisseth 35 años de edad, casada con 2 hijos aun bajo su responsabilidad, originaria de chinandega, ubicado en el occidente del país, es propietaria de un negocio de venta de mercadería en general como: ropa, zapatos, cosméticos, platería, perfumenes, cremas entre otros mas, sus compras las realiza fuera del país los cuales son al contado, donde después distribuye su mercadería a comerciantes minoristas de esta localidad, y a clientes fijos, uno de sus sueños es poder mejorar su vivienda y ver a sus hijos convertidos en unos profesionales algo que lamentablemente ella no logro realizar, el objetivo de este crédito es para comprar mercadería en general para así aprovechar las ventas en estas fechas porque su demanda crece y tiene mayores utilidades. robertha poco a poco ha logrado estabilizarse en este mercado tan competitivo, pero gracias al apoyo que los inversionistas kivas les ofrece a personas de bajos recursos económicos ha logrado mejorar un poco su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Robertha Lisseth, 35 years old and married with 2 children still under her care, came originally from Chinandega in the west of the country. She is the proprietor of a general merchandise store that sells clothing, shoes, cosmetics, silverware, perfume, and creams, among other items. Robertha imports her goods from outside the country, paying in cash, then distributes the merchandise to retail merchants in this locality, and to her fixed customers.

One of Robertha's dreams is to be able to improve her house and see her children become professionals, something that, lamentably, she herself could not achieve. Her goal for this loan is to purchase general merchandise to take advantage of seasonal sales when demand grows and profits increase.

Little by little, Robertha has been able to stabilize her position in this very competitive market. And, thanks to Kiva investors offering loans to people of meager economic resources, she has been able to make some improvements in her quality of life.

loans.use: buy general merchandise, including clothing, shoes, items from China, and creams, among other things.

loans.name: Teresa Del Rocio

texts.es:
La Señora Teresa desde hace  3 años forma parte del grupo de cerdito Las Cuencanitas, tiempo en que los créditos le han ayudado para crecer en su negocio. Vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es reconocida por su belleza natural, arquitectónica y cultural, es cuna de grandes Deportistas, escritores y sobre todo de gente muy amable.
La Señora Teresa tiene 45 años de edad, está casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos, dos de ellos ya son casados y viven independientes, uno de sus hijos estudia en la universidad y su ultimo hijo está en la escuela, su esposo tiene un taller donde arregla una gran variedad de artículos, la casa en la que vive es arrendada.
Doña Teresa labora como empleada privada de domingo a domingo, pero también tiene un negocio propio el cual va creciendo poco a poco, ella realiza y entrega de viandas, lleva 3 años en el negocio y también trabaja de domingo a domingo. 
El dinero de su crédito va a invertir en la compra de víveres y utensilios de cocina para agrandar su negocio. Su sueño es tener su propio restaurante.
texts.en:
For the past three years, Señora Teresa has been part of the “Las Cuencanitas” communal bank.  During this time, the loans have helped her to expand her business.  She lives in the city of Cuenca.  This city is known for its natural, architectural, and cultural beauty.  It is the birthplace of great athletes, writers, and above all, very kind people.

Señora Teresa is 45 years old.  She is married, and with her husband has four children.  Two of them are already married and living on their own, one of her children is studying in the university, and her last child is in school.  Her husband has a workshop where he fixes a wide variety of items.  The house where she lives is rented.

Doña Teresa works as a private employee seven days a week, but she also has her own business, which she has been growing bit by bit.  She makes and delivers food.  She has had this business for three years.  She also works at this seven days a week.

She is going to invest the money from her loan in the purchase of supplies and kitchen utensils to expand her business.  Her dream is to have her own restaurant.

loans.use: to buy kitchen supplies and utensils

loans.name: Abdu

texts.en:
Abdu is a 28-year-old man. He is single and lives in Sana`a, Yemen. For the past two years, he has been driving a taxi, which has been a profitable business. He started his business with collecting a small amount that covered buying a taxi. It is the main source of income for the family, but he also needs more support to cover the costs from time to time. He have daily income, but it is not enough to buy what he needs. 

Recently, his taxi has not been working well. So, he is requesting a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to help him cover the costs of purchasing the necessary spare parts for the taxi he drives. This will increase the taxi's capacity to work extra hours and enable Abdu to improve his family's income.

loans.use: to purchase necessary spare parts for the taxi he drives.

loans.name: El Pinar Group

texts.es: Yamei, tiene 30 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su pareja con quien tiene dos hijos y vive en concepción del sur Santa Bárbara. Anteriormente vendía ropa y hace 6 años se dedica a la agricultura de maíz y cría de cerdos. Ella solicita 5,000 Lempiras para comprar fertilizantes y pago de mano de obra en la siembra de maíz, y poder sacar mejor producción por el mantenimiento que le brinda. Su meta es mejorar la producción y que sus hijos tengan mejor vida. El préstamo es en forma grupal y se llama El Pinar, lo integran tres personas, que se dedican al cultivo de maíz y viven en la misma comunidad, el préstamo grupal es por 14,000 Lempiras con el cual compraran fertilizantes. en la foto al lado izquierdo esta Sandra, luego Yamei y Deysi.
texts.en:
Yamei is 30 years old.  She lives in a common-law relationship with her partner, with whom she has two children.  She lives in Concepción del Sur, Santa Bárbara.  Previously, she sold clothing, but for six years she has worked by farming corn and raising pigs.  

She is asking for 5,000 Lempiras to buy fertilizers and to pay for labor for the corn planting, and to be able to get a better yield due to the upkeep this will allow.  Her goal is to improve her yield and for her children to have a better life.  

The loan is a group loan.  The group is named El Pinar.  It is made up of three people who work farming corn; they live in the same community.  The group loan is for 14,000 Lempiras, with which they will buy fertilizers.  Sandra is on the left side in the photo, then Yamei and Deysi.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and to pay laborers for the corn crop

loans.name: Eladio

texts.es: Eladio de 59 años de edad vive con su esposa y sus seis hijos en casa propia, el se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 20 años su principal siembra es el maíz y el ajonjolí sus hijos mayores le ayudan en la siembra, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas  logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Eladio está solicitando un crédito para la compra de una lámpara solar ya que en la comunidad donde el reside nadie posee luz eléctrica y con lo que gana no le alcanza para poder realizarlo, la lámpara es una estación de carga con energía de paneles solares en forma de lámpara que sirve para los hogares de zonas rurales donde no poseen energía eléctrica,por esa razon esta solicitando el credito y poder comprar dicha lampara que muestra en la fotografia.
texts.en: Eladio, 59, lives with his wife and six children in a house that he owns.  He has operated a farming business for 20 years, growing maize and sesame.  His older children help him with the business and his income covers the family's everyday expenses.  Eladio is applying for a loan that he will use to buy a solar-powered lamp.  Electric connections are few and far between here and, even if it weren't, Eladio makes too little to afford service.  The lamp is a charging station with solar panels and a light that was designed for use in rural areas without easy access to electricity.  Eladio is holding one of the lamps in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar-powered lamp.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy bales of clothes to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Willian

texts.es: Willian, un hombre emprendedor , tiene 46 años de edad, es casado y vive con su esposa y un  hijo  actualmente, el solicito un préstamo con el anhelo de  comprar insumos como abonos y semilla de frijoles y ayudarse con la mano de obra , el desea realizar esta siembra de frijoles , con la finalidad de tener  buenas producciones , la única delimitación que este caballero tiene es la falta de dinero  para continuar creciendo, ya que de esta actividad económica dependen para poder salir adelante, por lo que él hace una solicitud  de  crédito , y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no registra otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja
texts.en:
46-year old Willian is an enterprising man. He is married and lives with his wife and son. He is seeking a loan as he has a great desire to buy supplies such as fertilizer and bean seeds as well as hire someone to help him. He wishes to sow the beans and have a good harvest. The only thing holding him back is the lack of money. Since farming is his only source of income and way forward, he really needs a loan.

This is Willian's first loan with FUDECOSUR, nor does he have any with other banks. FUDECOSUR is offering the easiest terms and the lowest interest rates.

loans.use: Buy bean seeds

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Parveen is a 54-year-old married woman and mother of seven children. For the past 25 years, her husband has been running a business of buying and selling rice, which he buys from the fields. He provides a valuable service in his community by selling rice to many of his client. At this time, he is financially weak due to the increasing price of rice in the market.

In this case, Parveen has requested a loan of PKR 30,000 to help her husband purchase rice for the business to increase the earning capacity of his rice selling business. She wishes to use part of the revenue for her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase rice from the fields.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is married and has children, all whom attend school. She owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. 

She operates a curio business, selling at the beach to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. Her dream is to establish a big business in the near future. 

With the KES 30,000. she wants to purchase beads, khangas (Kanga; similar to kitenge), and small pots for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase beads, khangas, and small pots for resale.

loans.name: Silvia Guadalupe

texts.es: Silvia de 46 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar desde hace mucho tiempo. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa para dama, caballeros y niños de forma ambulante. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Desea invertir en su negocio en la compra de mayor cantidad de mercadería para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de variedad de ropa como: faldas, pantalones, vestidos, blusas, ropa interior, etc. De esta forma espera mejorar sus ventas y sus ingresos con el fin de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Silvia is 46 years old and lives in her home with her family and has done so for a long time.  She sells women’s, men’s, and children’s clothing on foot and earns a living and supports her household this way.  She wants to buy merchandise in quantity and is asking for a loan through FUSAI to buy skirts, pants, dresses, blouses, undergarments, etc.  This way she can increase her sales and improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothing,

loans.name: Maria Hilda

texts.es: Maria de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus seis hijos, ella posee un molino en su lugar de residencia desde hace varios sus dos hijos mayores e ayudan en el negocio y su esposo trabaja de jornal en una finca que se encuentra cerca de su casa, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Maria esta solicitando un credito para la compra de una lampara salvasol que es una lampara de carga con energia de paneles solares, dirigida principalmente a hogares del area rural que carecen de conexion de energia electrica, por esa razon esta solicitando el credito y poder comprar dicha lampara que muestra en la fotografía
texts.en: Maria, 38, lives with her husband and six children in a house that she owns.  She has--with help from her two oldest children--operated a small mill for many years.  Her husband is a farm laborer and their combined income covers the family's everyday expenses.  Maria is applying for a loan that she will use to buy a solar-powered lamp.  The lamp was designed for use in rural areas that lack easy access to electricity and can be charged with solar power.  Maria is holding one of the lamps in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar-power lamp.

loans.name: Eladio Israel

texts.es: Eladio de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos, el se dedica a la albañilería desde hace varios años, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Eladio esta solicitando un credito para la compra de una lampara salvasol que es una lampara de carga con energia de paneles solares, dirigida principalmente a hogares del area rural que carecen de conexion de energia electrica, por esa razon esta solicitando el credito y poder comprar dicha lampara que muestra en la fotografia
texts.en: Eladio, 37, lives with his wife and four children in a house that he owns.  He has been a construction worker for many years and his income covers the family's everyday expenses.  Eladio is applying for a loan that he will use to buy a solar-powered lamp.  The lamp was designed for use in rural areas that lack easy access to electricity and can be charged with solar power.  Eladio is holding one of the lamps in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a solar-powered lamp.

loans.name: Hernan

texts.en:
Hernan’s interest in farming began when he was co-director for a recycling and compost company in Texas. His job involved literally transforming barren fields into green space and he took what he learned to start a small urban farm in his backyard.  When his wife’s job brought their family to San Diego, they chose to live in the rural countryside, allowing Hernan to take his farming venture to the next level.

“We always wanted to be close to nature, raise our kids in nature, and be self-sufficient through growing our own food,” shared Hernan. “It’s empowering to be able to produce something and provide for others, instead of consuming without participation.”

Hernan launched Solidarity Farms, growing all sorts of seasonal vegetables and selling fresh produce and eggs at the entrance of the farm.  He also participates in a community supported agriculture program in which his farm weekly delivers $25 boxes of produce to members of the program.  All this ultimately supports Hernan’s vision of building a vibrant food system that primarily supports local producers.  Furthermore, Hernan is passionate about helping others consume whole and healthy foods.  

“I grew up watching my grandparents grow their food in their farm. They would not eat anything without knowing where it was coming from,” shared Hernan. “They lived long lives, working well into their 70s. That childhood memory inspired my business.”

As the sole farmer on his farm, Hernan is always looking for ways to increase efficiency.  He recently expanded his property from 3/4 of an acre to 5 acres and needs a tractor to help him scale up his operations.  He will use his $5,000 Kiva loan to purchase a tractor, allowing him to bring his business to the next level.

Hernan’s dream is ultimately to build a thriving farm that produces healthy food for his community and educates others on the value of farming.  He shared, “I want to awaken a passion in others to become farmers. What is more gratifying than healing people with food?”

In the picture are Hernan, his wife Lisa, and their three children

loans.use: to purchase a tractor

loans.name: Elizabeth Del Carmen

texts.es: Elizabeth del Carmen mayor de edad madera soltera de dos hijas aun bajo su responsabilidad, originaria del municipio de chinandega, ubicado en el occidente del país, donde predomina el comercio y el turismo, se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora con muchos deseos de superación laboral como personal, es una microempresaria, que con esfuerzos y capital propio logra poner una pulperia en su casa de habitación, donde ofrece productos de consumo del hogar como: granos básicos, productos congelados, entre otros, también tiene dos negocio mas uno que es venta de leche de vaca y el de mercadería en general como: ropa, cosméticos, perfumenes donde el cual tiene a una persona que le realiza las entregas domiciliar a sus clientes que son fijos y en algunas ocasiones eventuales, sus compras son al contado, El objetivo del préstamo es para invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su pulpería para y cubrir la demanda de sus clientes, al igual que invertir en mercadería en general ya que su demanda ha crecido mayormente por lo que están próximas las fiestas navideñas y son las mejores época para invertir.
texts.en: Elizabeth del Carmen is a single mother of two daughters for whom she is still responsible. She is from the municipality of Chinandega, located in the western part of the country, where trade and tourism are the main economic activities. She is characterized by being an enterprising woman with desires to improve professionally and personally. She is a a small business owner, who with effort and her own resources, managed to set up a grocery store in her home, where she offers products that are consumed at home like staple grains and frozen products, among others. She also has two other businesses. One of them is selling cow's milk and the other is selling general merchandise such as clothes, cosmetics, and perfumes. She has someone make home deliveries to her regular customers and on some occasions, she makes cash sales. The purpose of this loan is to invest in working capital, stock her grocery store, meet the demand of her customers, and invest in general merchandise. Her demand has grown a lot because the holiday season is near and that is the best time to invest.

loans.use: to buy products consumed at home and general merchandise such as staple grains, frozen products, various styles of clothing, and cosmetics, among others.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is a 45-year-old married woman; she has three children. She describes herself as a self motivated person. 

Joyce operates a dairy farm where she keeps dairy cows, which produce milk to sell. Her business is located in a conducive environment, and her primary customers are the general public.

She describes her biggest business challenge to be a lack of enough funds and transport problems. 

She will use the Kes 90,000 loan to purchase animal feed and drugs for the dairy animals. 

Her business goal is to reach a wide network within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will be financially stable and will have a better life. 

This is her third loan with SMEP DTM.  She will use the anticipated profits to improve her standards of living.

loans.use: to purchase animal feed and drugs for the dairy animals

loans.name: Aasiya

texts.en:
Aasiya had a difficult time after her husband's business failed. She decided to work with her husband to support her family for a better future. So she began sewing in her house. 

She sews for people living around her house, and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to lack of availability of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. 

She is currently in her second loan cycle, and has borrowed Rs 20,000 from Kashf. She wants to use this loan amount to buy more spools of thread, along with the packs of lace, zippers, and buttons to create a way of increasing revenue so she may be able to generate a healthier source of income.

loans.use: to buy more spools of thread, along with packs of lace, zippers, and buttons.

loans.name: Osama

texts.en:
Osama is a 27-year-old married man and has a child, living in Sana`a, Yemen. He is a driver in an association, getting a low salary. He has a financial problem because his salary isn`t enough to cover his family's expenses. 

He is applying for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB in order to buy furniture to use in his house. He is planning to open a retail store to make sure that his income is good enough to cover his and his family's expenses too, at the same time.

loans.use: to buy furniture to use in his house.

loans.name: Maruza

texts.en: Maruza is 53 years old. She is married and has five children. Her husband is a master in repairing cars. Maruza works hard to earn money for a living. She is a sewer. She sews dresses at her house and has regular clients. Her daughter studies at the university. Maruza must pay her daughter’s tuition, but her income is small. She is asking for a loan to pay for her daughter’s tuition. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's education.

loans.name: Aly

texts.en:
Aly is married and has two children who are non-adults. He always wanted to provide them with good quality of life, and that’s why he decided to start a new bakery business. He knows all aspects of making bread. He worked in Russia for some years. Now, he came back to Tajikistan and does not have a job. He must provide his family with all the necessary things. He is eager to organize his bakery business fast. His wife will help him with the business. He will be a very successful businessman as he is hardworking and smart. 

He is asking for a loan of 15,000 Tajikistani Somoni (TJS) to buy equipment for making bread and for organizing the new business. He will get through using the loan, and his business will be a source of income, so that his family can have a good quality of life and better financial opportunities to progress. He awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy equipment for making bread and for organizing a new business.

loans.name: Odili

texts.es: Odili , tiene 48  años de edad, es casada y vive con su esposo y cinco  hijos actualmente, ella  solicito un préstamo con el anhelo de  comprar insumos como abonos, y fumigantes, ella  desea dar asistencia a los cultivos de café, con la finalidad de mantenerlas en buenas condiciones durante su desarrollo, para obtener un producto de buena calidad , la única delimitación que  tiene es la falta de dinero  para continuar creciendo, ya que de esta actividad económica dependen para poder salir adelante, por lo que élla  hace una solicitud  de  crédito y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no registra otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja……
texts.en:
Odili is 48 years old and lives with her husband and five children.  She is seeking a loan with the aim of purchasing supplies such as fertilizer and fumigant.   She needs these items in order to keep her coffee crops in good condition during the growing season.

The only barrier to obtaining a high-quality product is that she lacks funds to continue growing her crops.  Her family depends on this economic activity in order to get ahead.  Thus, she is seeking her first loan through FUDECOSUR.  She has not taken other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has brought her this loan opportunity with greater ease and at a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase supplies.

loans.name: Zahida

texts.en: Zahida is 26 years old, vigorous, and has earned a living by stitching clothes for many years. She works for people in her community and uses the money she earns to support her entire family. However, due to a lack of available of funds, she is unable to completely satisfy the needs of her customers. For this reason she is requesting a loan for Rs 15,000 from the Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan to buy more spools of thread in different colors along with packs of laces, zippers and buttons. This will help her make more dresses on time and generate a larger income. She hopes to make good use of this new loan to begin living a better life.

loans.use: to buy more spools of thread in different colors, laces, zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Nighat

texts.en:
Nighat, age 58, is a married woman. She sews for the people of her community, and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to a lack of available funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. 

For this reason, she requested a loan of Rs 25,000 from Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan to buy more spools of thread in different colors, along with packs of lace, zippers, and buttons to create a means of increasing revenues, so she may able to generate a healthier source of income. 

She is in her second loan cycle with a good credit history.

loans.use: to buy more spools of thread in different colors, with packs of lace, zippers, and buttons.

loans.name: Kalsoom

texts.en: Kalsoom is a 33-year-old married woman who has for many years earned a living by selling milk with her husband. She has one cow, which produces the milk she sells to the people in her area. She also sells butter and cheese to generate extra profits. Kalsoom has become famous for providing good-quality milk and is pleased to be able to contribute to her family's income. She is requesting a loan for PKR 35,000 to buy one more cow. She hopes that this loan will bring positive changes to her business. This will be her fourth loan, and she has a good repayment history.

loans.use: to buy another cow.

loans.name: Teresa Elisa

texts.es:
Teresa de 44 años de edad tiene un grado de estudio primario cursado hasta el 5 grado, es casada y en compañía de su esposo se dedican a la agricultura. Sus 5 hijos ayudan en el desempeño que diariamente realizan para asistir sus cultivos de café como ser: limpieza, aplicación de abono, recolección del gano entre otras que ayudan al bienestar de sus cultivos. Desde muy temprana edad ella practica la caficultura ya que desciende de una familia por vocación agricultora siendo sus padres quienes le enseñaran a trabajar la tierra y las diferentes técnicas. Sus clientes son las bodegas de la localidad, intermediarios que llegan a la zona, vecinos y amigos que revenden el producto como también algunos de sus familiares pero siendo la prioridad las bodegas ya que son quienes a mejor precio compran.
Sus planes son muchos pero sus metas son ampliar sus cultivos de café, sembrar una mejor variedad de café más competitivo y atractivo con el cual por medio de la venta pueda generar mayores ingresos para su familia. Como madre de familia apoyar a sus hijos en sus metas y decisiones pero sobre todo en sus estudios ya que es la mejor herencia que ella considera puede dejar a ellos.
por lo que hoy día Teresa solicita financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas como abono, foliares, formula cafetalera, entre otros que aran que sus cultivos den una buena producción y tengan el cuidado necesario para que esto sea posible.
texts.en:
Teresa is 44 years old and has a 5th grade education.  She is married and together with her husband they work in agriculture. Their five children help take care of the coffee crops every day by doing such things as clearing, applying fertilizer, and harvesting the beans, among other things that help maintain their crops.  She has been involved in coffee growing since she was very young as she comes from a family who has worked in agriculture, and it was her parents who taught her to work the land and the skills involved. Her customers are the local bodegas, buyers who come to the region, neighbors and friends who resell the product, as well as some family members. But her priority are the bodegas because they buy at the best price.

She has many plans but her goals are to increase her coffee crops and plant a better variety of coffee that is more attractive and competitive. This will generate more income for her family. As the mother of a family she wants to support her children in their goals and decisions, but especially in their studies which is the best legacy she thinks she can leave to them. 

For these reasons Teresa is asking for a loan so she can buy agricultural supplies such as manure, leaf fertilizers, coffee formula, among other things that will allow her to provide the necessary care for her plants so that they yield a good crop.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her coffee crops.

loans.name: Uhuru Group

texts.en:
Uhuru is a Nuru International group of three farmers in Kuria West District in Kenya. The members joined the group to acquire skills and knowledge on improving farming methods. They are able to obtain loans through Nuru to acquire farm inputs. As a group, the members of Uhuru collectively guarantee the loan.

Mutindi, who is raising up her hand, has been a member of this group for two years, and has learned a lot about better farming methods. She is married with four children. 

She hopes to obtain a loan from KIVA, which will enable her to purchase fertilizer and hybrid seeds of sorghum, maize, and millet.  

She believes she will secure food for her household, and obtain a surplus. Mutindi plans to sell the surplus of the produce to obtain money to contribute to her children’s education.

loans.use: To purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to grow maize, sorghum, and millet

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a grain dryer

loans.name: Shinu

texts.en:
Shinu is 24 years old. She is married and has been blessed with one son. She lives with her son and husband in the small village of Raipara in Dhupguri in the district of Jalpaiguri. She passed grade 7 and is a housewife. Her husband, Samir, is a farmer by profession. He attended school up to grade 7. Their son is below the school-going age.

Shinu's husband has been cultivating seasonal crops on their own plot of land. He gives hard labour to grow good-quality crops, which he sells in the local market. He is the only earning member of the family. His main challenge is to give the family a better living condition, which he cannot give with his small income. That’s why Shinu and her husband have decided to start cultivation of potatoes.

Shinu is a woman with a lot of strength and much desire to get ahead and prosper in life. She has taken a loan from BJS to purchase potato seeds and fertilizers to start potato cultivation. She hopes to get excellent revenues for meeting her compromises and continue to enjoy the benefits and opportunities that life presents to continue progressing in her business.

Her future plans are to give their children proper education and prepare themselves to become professionals.

She is thankful to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase potato seeds and fertilizers for starting potato cultivation.

loans.name: Carlos Arturo

texts.es:
Carlos de 45  años de edad, casado con tres hijos de 19,12 y 5 meses, los dos mayores están estudiando. Es originario de la zona central de país. Se caracteriza por ser trabajador, responsable, con ganas de superación personal. Desde muy joven lucha para brindarles a su familia la estabilidad económica, emocional que necesitan, y poder cumplir sus sueños como es ver formados en profesionales a sus hijos.

Gracias  a su esfuerzo tiene por actividad económica el servicio de transporte de un interlocal el cual tiene una ruta específica. El dedica a su negocio unas 12 horas diarias ofreciendo sus servicios. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en darle mantenimiento a su unidad de transporte como es el cambio de llantas nuevas, ya que en la temporada de diciembre tiene mayor de demanda. Carlos agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva le brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Carlos is 45 years ols and married with three children. They are ages nineteen, twelve, and five months, and the two oldest are in school. He is from the central area of the country. He is known to be hardworking, responsible, and eager to improve himself. Ever since he was very young he has been fighting to give his family the financial and emotional stability they need and to make his dreams come true, like seeing his children grow up to become professionals.

Thanks to his effort, his business is driving a local transportation vehicle, which has a specific route. He dedicates about twelve hours per day to his business providing his services. 

The purpose of this loan is to do maintenance on his vehicle by changing the tires because december is a season with higher demand. Carlos appreciates the help Kiva lenders offer people with limited resources in poor countries like Nicaragua to earn a decent living.

loans.use: to buy new tires for his local transportation vehicle.

loans.name: Leovigildo

texts.es: Leovigildo, un hombre emprendedor , tiene 35 años de edad, es casado y vive con su esposa y dos hijos actualmente, el solicito un préstamo con el anhelo de  comprar insumos como abonos, y fumigantes, el desea dar asistencia a los cultivos de café, con la finalidad de mantenerlas en buenas condiciones durante su desarrollo, para obtener un producto de buena calidad , la única delimitación que este caballero tiene es la falta de dinero  para continuar creciendo, ya que de esta actividad económica dependen para poder salir adelante, por lo que él hace una solicitud  de  crédito , y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no registra otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja……
texts.en:
An entrepreneurial man, Leovigildo is 35 years old, is married, and lives with his wife and two children. He is currently asking for a loan because he wants to buy supplies like fertilizers and fumigants. He wishes to give assistance to his coffee crops to keep them in good conditions during their development in order to obtain a good quality product. 

The only limit that this gentleman has is a lack of money to continue growing, as they depend on this financial activity to get ahead. He is therefore making a request for a loan. This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not gotten any other loans from state banks; FUDECOSUR has provided him with the loan with greater assistance and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy supplies

loans.name: Elizabet

texts.es: Elizabet, tiene 33 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su conyugue con quien tiene 4 hijos y reside en el municipio de Choloma, Cortes. Elizabet, realiza dos actividades, una es que confecciona ropa de vestir y otra es que vende ropa usada, lleva 10 años realizando estas actividades para la generación de ingresos. Para mantener el negocio a solicitado varios prestamos y actualmente solicita el quinto ciclo que es por 4,500 Lempiras, con el cual va comprar ropa usada clasificada para vender en esta temporada navideña. Su plan es incrementar las ganancias para tener un mejor nivel de vida.
texts.en: Elizabet is 33 years old and lives with her common-law husband and four children in the municipality of Choloma, Cortes. She is involved in two business activities: she sews clothing and also sells used clothing. She has been doing these things for ten years in order to generate income. In order to run her business she has taken out several loans, and is currently seeking her fifth loan. She will use the 4,500 lempiras in order to purchase used clothing to sell during the upcoming Christmas season. Her plan is to increase her earnings so that she can improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase used clothing for resale.

loans.name: Enma Leticia

texts.es: Enma, tiene 39 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos a su cargo y un nieto, con quienes vive en el municipio de San Pedro Sula. La señora se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas de maíz desde hace 12 años. El negocio lo tiene en su casa y los clientes llegan a comprarle allí. Esta solicitando un préstamo por 4,000 lempiras para invertirlos en la compra de harina de maíz y leña para la elaboración de tortillas. Con el préstamo va comprar al por mayor y así podrá vender tortillas todo el día. Ella tiene como meta remodelar el local y que se mantenga el negocio para poder ayudar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
39-year old Enma is a single mother with two children and a grandchild in her care. They live in the municipality of of San Pedro Sula. She has earned her living making and selling corn tortillas for 12 years. She runs the business from her home and her customers go there to buy the tortillas.

Enma is seeking a loan of 4,000 lampiras to buy cornflour and firewood at wholesale prices, and then she will be able to sell tortillas throughout the day. Her goal is to renovate the premises and keep the business going so that she can help her children.

loans.use: Buy cornflour and firewood for her tortilla business

loans.name: Najma

texts.en:
Najma is a 43-year-old married woman and mother of six children. She is trying hard to fulfill their demands, including food, health, clothing, and education.   She, along with her husband, have been doing agriculture work for many years. They crop different vegetables and fruits, and sell them at the local market.  Her son also assists her in growing various crops by watering the soil for good quality production. She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. 

In order to purchase different types of seeds, along with the packs of insecticides and pesticides, Najma applied for a loan of PKR 20,000. This will help her grow more crops, which will ultimately help in generating more cash.

loans.use: to purchase different types of seeds, along with packs of insecticides and pesticides.

loans.name: Rabia

texts.en:
Rabia is a 28-year-old married woman who has been doing business selling milk for many years. She has two cows to milk, and sells milk to many of her neighbors, along with the butter that she makes from the milk. 

Her business is good enough for her to lead a decent life. She is very motivated to provide her family with good health, food, and clothing.  

For the improvement of her business, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied a loan of Rs. 15,000. It will help her to purchase one more cow to increase her sales. 

She is expecting a boost in her earnings, and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: Saidazim

texts.ru: Саидазим родился в 1994 году. Он добросовестный и талантливый молодой человек. Саидазим не женат и живет с родителями. Саидазим является студентом 2 курса Таджикского Государственного Университета Политики и Бизнеса. Саидазим учится в факультете Таможенное дело. Он является одним из успешных студентов. Он активно участвует в общественной жизни университета. Саидазим должен оплатить за учебный договор, но не имеет денег. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 650 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Saidazim was born in 1994.  He is a kind and talented young man.  Saidazim is not married and he lives with his parents.  He is a second-year student at the Tajik State University of Politics and Business.  He studies in the department of customs affairs and he is a successful student.  Saidazim actively participates in student life at his university.  He needs to pay for his tuition, but he doesn't have enough money.  He is asking for a loan of $650 to pay for his tuition.  He is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for tuition

loans.name: Lilian Arely

texts.es:
Lilian de 29 años de edad, es una madre soltera de una hija de 9 años de edad. Ella pudo estudiar hasta educación media ( bachillerato), no continuo estudiando, porque en ese momento quedo embarazada. Actualmente solo se dedica al cuidado de su hija y a realizar su trabajo como promotora de salud. Su hija estudia mientra ella trabaja.
Ella es promotora de salud, desde hace 5 años, su familia se dedica a la elaboración de teja, oficio del cual tiene 7 años de experiencia, ella se dedica mas a la administración del negocio. La mejor época para la elaboración de teja es de noviembre hasta abril(época seca).
Trabaja como promotora  de lunes a viernes de 7:30am a 3:30, el fin de semana lo dedica a la tejera. Sus dos  hermanas están mas de lleno en el negocio.
El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar leña, barro, tierra negra, tierra blanca y pagar a los trabajadores para la elaboración de las tejas. Este año quiere aumentar su producción, por el hecho de ver gran demanda del producto, con el financiamiento quiere aprovechar la oportunidad que se le presenta.
Desea que su hija pueda seguir estudiando, que no le falte nada. También pretende mejorar su vivienda, el piso, repellar las paredes y tener mejores condiciones en el hogar y si se le presenta la oportunidad de estudiar en la universidad, pues retomaría la formación académica.
texts.en:
Lilian is a 29-year-old single mother and lives with her 9-year-old daughter.  She was able to complete high school but did not do any further studies, since she had become pregnant by that time.  Currently she is dedicated solely to caring for her daughter and doing her job as a health promoter.  Her daughter attends school while she is at work.

She has worked as a health promoter for five years.  Her family also has a business making tiles, which she has personally been involved with for 7 years, mostly in the administration of the business.  The busiest time for making tiles is from November until April, since it is the dry season.

She does her health promotion work from Monday through Friday from 7:30 am until 3:30 pm.  On the weekends she works in the tile business.  Her two sisters are also very busy with the business.

She is seeking a loan in order to purchase firewood, mud, black and white clay, and also to pay laborers for making the tiles.  This year she wants to increase their production, since there is a lot of demand for the product.  With the loan she will be able to take advantage of the present opportunity.

She wants her daughter to keep studying, and she wants to make sure she has everything she needs.  She also wants to make improvements to her home, to repair her floor and to re-plaster her walls.  This will lead to improved conditions at home. Also, if the opportunity to study at the university level presents itself, she will revive her academic career.

loans.use: to purchase firewood, mud, black and white clay, and also to pay laborers for making tiles.

loans.name: Ameeran

texts.en:
Ameeran is a 36-year-old married woman and mother of eight children. She has been running a business of selling milk for the past seven years. She has two buffaloes, which she uses for selling milk to the people of her locality. She also sells butter and cheese to generate an extra amount of profit. Ameeran   has become famous for providing good-quality milk, and makes enough to contribute to her family's income. She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation.

Currently, she is in her sixth loan cycle, and applied for a loan of PKR 45,000. This will allow her to purchase one more buffalo. Ameeran is hopeful that this loan will bring positive changes to her business.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay his medical bills.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a large quantity of clothes to add to his current stock

loans.name: One Word Bassa Town Group

texts.en:
Meet members of the “One Word Bassa Town” group from Waterloo, a town in  northwestern Sierra Leone. They are all local entrepreneurs who have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org, to apply for a loan of 500,000 Sierra Leonean Leones (SLL) for each. With the help of this loan they will be able to expand their respective businesses, make more sales, and consequently improve their living conditions. 

Sallay is the featured leader of this group. The 50-year-old is married to a trader and the couple  has two children. Sallay has been a businesswoman for two years now, and she sells charcoal.  With her share of this loan, she will buy a large quantity of charcoal to add to her current stock.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of charcoal to add to her current stock

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en:
Nasreen is a 47-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her son at the corner of her house. Her son also assists her by purchasing her stock of goods from the market as he has maintained many contacts over the years. Nasreen is a mother of two children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food and healthcare. 

Nasreen wants to grow her business so she requested a loan of PKR 30,000 to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages to meet the increasing demand at her store. She is in her 5th loan cycle with good repayment history.

loans.use: to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages.

loans.name: Misbah

texts.en:
Misbah is 31 years old and a married woman. She has been successfully running a beauty parlor for the last two years. She offers many facilities to her customers such as makeup, hair styling and facials. Through providing her best services, she has become famous in her street.

 In order to meet the increasing demands of her customers, she is interested in buying more variety of cosmetics products for her parlor. But because of having low cash in hand, she contacted Kashf Foundation to apply for her first loan. She needs a loan of Rs 20,000 to buy hair care products, skin products and creams for bleaching and whitening in large quantities. She is hopeful to cater to more customers as repeat clients, time after time. She is very experienced in her business and confident that her business will move toward a positive direction as a result of the loan investment.

loans.use: to buy hair care products, skin products and creams for bleaching and whitening in large quantities.

loans.name: Razia
