She will use the KES 50,000 loan to buy more curtains to sell. Her business goal is to have a retail shop within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will be financially stable. 

This is her second loan with SMEP DTM. A previous loan of KES 20,000 was repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to pay back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more curtains to sell.

loans.name: Musu

texts.en:
Meet Musu. She is a 30-year-old from Jui, eastern area, in Freetown. She is married with children. In 2000, Musu established her fish business. She began her business because she wanted to generate a permanent source of income. She works at the business from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m., seven days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is insufficient capital to expand her business.

Musu requires a loan in order to purchase more fish to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to take care of her children's education and increase her business. In the future, Musu plans to expand her business more. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to expand her business.

loans.name: Kadiatu

texts.en:
Meet Kaditu, a 45-year-old woman from Jui eastern area in Freetown. She is married and has three children.  

In 2009, Kadiatu established her retail business. She began her business because she wanted to generate a permanent source of income to maintain her family. She works at the business from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m., seven days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is insufficient capital to expand her business.

Kadiatu requires a loan in order to purchase more items like bags, cream and perfume to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to build a permanent business structure and increase her business. In the future, Kadiatu plans to open a big shop. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more items like bags, cream and perfume to expand her business.

loans.name: Sheyla Mercedes

texts.es: Sheyla de 25 años de edad, se dedica a la actividad comercial desde hace 5 años, cuando tomó esta experincia de su madre al ayudarla en su negocio, y posteriormente cuando empezó a estudiar en la universidad, su madre le dio un capital, para que trabajandolo en lo que ella habia aprendido, sustentara sus propios gastos e inició su venta de mercancias variadas, entre sus compañeros de clases y así fue creciendo poco a poco. Hoy su meta es ampliar su negocio,pues vende mediante guias especializadas de productos, y quiere ganar mucho mas, para finalmente, converirse en una profesional exitosa, por eso trabaja todos los dias persistentemente, vendiendo de contado y a crédito, ropa, accesorios, calzado y todo lo que la demanda de su clientela le exige. Su mayor desafio es la alta competencia, por eso acude a un credikiva, primer finaciamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo,  con el cual comprará ropa, accesorios femeninos, y calzado, con lo cual diversificará un poco mas su oferta, responderá mucho mas a su demanda, y con ello se propone impactar a su clientela en la temporada del año, mas activa a nivel comercial, para ganar mas clientes y mas dinero.
texts.en: Sheyla is 25 years old and has been a merchant for five years, having learned about this from her mother when she used to help her in her own business, and later when she began studying at university, her mother gave her some money so she could work in what she learned, pay her own expenses, and sell some merchandise to her classmates.  In this way she began to grow her business little by little.  Now her goal is to expand her business, sell more products, and earn much more so she can become a successful professional.  This is why she works every day selling clothing, accessories, shoes, and whatever her customers request for cash and credit.  Her challenge is the competition and she is asking for a Kiva loan, her first through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, with which she can buy clothing, women’s accessories, and shoes so she will have a bit more to offer and response more to her demand and better serve her customers during this time of year, the most active commercially, so she can earn more.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en:
Meet 30-year-old Fatmata from Tombo, a western, rural area in Freetown. She is married, with two children.  

For the past seven years, Fatmata has established a baby clothing material business. She began her business because she needed to create income to support the home. She works at the business 12 hours per day and seven days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is moving door-to-door to introduce her goods, which is very difficult.

Fatmata requires a loan in order to buy more pants, vests, and baby clothing material to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business and to have a permanent business location. 

In the future, Fatmata plans to own a big shop. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more pants, vests, and baby clothing material to expand her business.

loans.name: Ana Elvira

texts.es: Ana  vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, productos de belleza, cuadernos, etc. su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por la variedad de productos que ofrece y por los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra sacar adelante a sus tres hijos, Ana esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos por mayor para poder surtir mas su negocio y asi obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ana lives in her own house with her three children. She makes a living selling clothes, beauty products, notebooks, etc. Her business is located at her house and she has many clients thanks to the variety of products she offers and their good prices. She is able to support her children with what she earns. 

Ana is requesting a loan to buy more products in bulk and stock her business. This way she will be able to increase her income and provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothes, beauty products, notebooks, etc. in bulk.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesús

texts.es:
Manuel, es un joven de 29 años de edad, es muy trabajador ejemplo a seguir, hoy en día el joven está alquilando una habitación, donde descansa cuando llega del trabajo, ya que es muy pesado, porque se moviliza mucho de un lugar a otro.
Manuel tiene 3 años de trabajar en una funeraria, donde desempeña el cargo de vendedor de ataúdes, visita muchos lugares para venderles a las personas, además es muy conocido y recomendado por los propietarios de la funeraria.
Con el préstamo se estará ayudando al cliente, para que pueda comprar una motocicleta, ya que visita muchos lugares lejanos y tiene la necesidad de penetrar otros cantones donde el acceso es limitado.
Su sueño es tener una casa propia, con una familia muy bonita.
texts.en:
Manuel is a 29-year old young man. He is very hard-working and an example to follow. He is currently renting a room, where he rests after work, which is very tiring and implies moving a lot from one place to the other. Manuel has worked in a funeral home for three years. He sells coffins and needs to visit many places. He is popular and recommended by the funeral home owners. 

The loan will be used to buy him a motorcycle, given that he needs to visit many distant places and enter cantons with limited access. His dream is to have his own house and a beautiful family.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her existing capacity of saucepans, plastic buckets, and plastic bowls.

loans.name: Yatta

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 40-year-old Yatta Married from Tombo western rural area in Freetown. She is married and blessed with 3 children. She started her business to take care of her family. 

Yatta runs a palm oil business at home; she sells palm oil and beans. She has been running this business for 15 years now. She works at the business throughout the week, from morning to night. Yatta says that the main challenges to her business are  transportation prices and insufficient funds for expanding her business.

Yatta has requested a loan in order to buy more gallons of palm oil for resale. The extra income from this loan will allow her to educate her children and increase her business. In the future, she plans to expand her business. She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to buy more gallons of palm oil to resell.

loans.name: Kadiatu

texts.en:
Meet 26-year-old Kadiatu from Tombo Western rural area in Freetown. She is married and has 2 children. For the past 7 years, Kadiatu has been running her clothing material business. She began her business because she needed to create income to support the home. She works at the business 12 hours per day and 7 days per week. She says that the main challenge in her business is the difficulty of moving door to door to introduce her goods.

Kadiatu requires a loan in order to buy more clothing material to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her business and improve her family's welfare. In the future, Kadiatu plans to own a big shop. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more clothing material to expand her business.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is 39 year old and operates a retail store where she sells charcoal, which she has been doing for five years. Her business is located in an area with potential and her primary customers are the general public. Her biggest challenge is lack of funds.

Lydia is requesting her second loan from SMEP DTM for 50,000 KES, which she will use to buy more charcoal to sell. She will use the anticipated profits to pay back the loan. She hopes that in the future she will be financially stable.

loans.use: to purchase more charcoal to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is a 50-year-old, married man, with six children, living in Kamwenge, Uganda. 

He is a farmer and that's how he earns a living. He also earns an additional income from his monthly salary. He started farming after buying a leaf from his neighbor who is a model farmer in his village. He has hardships of price fluctuations and seasonal changes. John has a dream of educating his children to higher levels and of becoming a model farmer. 

John intends to use the loan to buy manure and seedlings.

loans.use: to buy manure and seedlings.

loans.name: Abraham

texts.en:
Abaham is a twenty-six-year-old married man living in Kamwenge, Uganda. His main business is agriculture but he also earns additional income from monthly payments. He is a large-scale farmer and faces hardships of lack of enough manpower to do digging on time because of using manual labour, Another challenge is price fluctuations. His vision is to become a rich man in future. 

Abraham intends to use the loan to buy oxen for ploughing.

loans.use: to buy oxen for ploughing.

loans.name: Thiane

texts.fr: Madame Thiané est une femme veuve  et mère de famille. Elle habite dans un quartier de la commune et évolue dans la commercialisation des légumes. Elle dispose d’un étale au marché et commence sa journée à 10 pour la finir vers les couts de 18h. Thiané sollicite ce montant pour acheter et revendre des légumes. Elle a une expérience de plus de 20ans dans cette activité et prend en charge les dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille. A l’avenir, elle souhaite avoir un champ ou elle cultivera du maraichage et avoir aussi des boutiques au niveau du marché pour pouvoir augmenter ses revenus et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille
texts.en: Mrs. Thiané is a widow with children. She lives in a neighbourhood of the town and she sells vegetables. She has a stall at the market and starts her day at 10 am and finishes it on the chimes of 6 pm. Thiané requests this loan to buy vegetables for resale. She has over 20 years' experience in this business and provides for the daily expenses of her family. In the future, she hopes to have a field where she would grow the produce and also shops in the market in order to increase her income and improve living conditions for her family.

loans.use: To buy vegetables to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is 36 years old and lives in the town of Gaba in the region of Kampala South in Uganda. She is married and has four children, who are all currently in school. For the past six years, Catherine has been working hard to manage her boutique, which sells bags and clothes of all kinds. 

To help expand her business, Catherine has requested a loan of 2,500,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase more clothes and bags, and will help Catherine to generate greater profits and enable her meet other basic needs and pay her children's school fees in time. Catherine hopes that in the future, she will be able to open up another business in Konge. 

Catherine is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Catherine who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes and bags

loans.name: Mariama

texts.en:
Mariama is 40 years old and married with 3 children. She runs a domestic product inTombo western rural area in Freetown. She started her business because she wanted to improve the conditions for her family. She's been in this business since after the war. She sells glass cups, knives and food containers within her community. She says that the main problem to her business is improper business location.

Mariama requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more spoons and a variety of food containers for resale. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her to increase her business and take care of her family. In the future, she would like to open a big shop. She is grateful for your support.

loans.use: to purchase more spoons and varieties of food containers for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more oil and pepper.

loans.name: Dickson

texts.en:
Dickson is a thirty-five-year-old married man living in Kamwenge, Uganda. His main business is a retail shop but he also earns a monthly salary from teaching as his additional income. He has hardships of competition and price fluctuations. His family dream is to provide for his home. His vision is to own a wholesale shop. 

Dickson intends to use the loan to buy more goods like sugar and soap to sell.

loans.use: to buy more goods like sugar and soap to sell.

loans.name: Faustino

texts.en:
Faustino is a twenty-nine-year-old married man with two children living in Kamwenge, Uganda. His main business is brick making but he also sells goats and sheep in order to earn additional income. He has hardships of weather changes especially the rainy season, where his bricks take a long time to dry yet he expects constant income. His dream is to have a machine for making bricks. 

Faustino intends to use the loan to buy materials to make more bricks to sell.

loans.use: to buy materials to make more bricks to sell.

loans.name: Mariana

texts.es: Mariana de 28 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos de 10 y 12 años de edad. Mariana posee una tienda en su casa de habitación en la cual vende variedad de productos de primera necesidad. Su deseo es ampliar su tienda con el fin de mejorar las ventas y sus ingresos ya que desea dar a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida a las que ella y su esposo han tenido. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de productos de tienda como: huevos, cereales, golosinas, aceite, macarrones, detergente, etc.
texts.en:
Mariana, age 28, lives in her own house together with her husband and her two children, ages 10 and 12.  

Mariana has a store in her home where she sells a variety of staples.  Her wish is to expand her store with the goal of improving her sales and her income. She wants to give her children better living conditions than what she and her husband have had.  Because of this, she is asking for this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of products for her store such as: eggs, cereal, snacks, oil, pasta, detergent, etc.

loans.use: to buy eggs, cereal, snacks, oil, pasta, detergent, etc.

loans.name: Wilberto

texts.es: Wilberto, es padre de un hijo de 11 años de edad a quien apoya  en su educación  entre otros gastos, Wilberto se dedica a trabajar como mecánico tornero en un taller y su esposa atiende una pequeña pulpería que tiene en su casa de habitación, Wilberto desea repellar las paredes y piso de su humilde hogar que con tanto esfuerzo y sacrificio ha venido levantando por etapas, con el financiamiento que solicita podrá comprar los materiales como cemento, arena y el pago de la mano de obra, lo que vendrá a mejorar cada vez más sus condiciones de vida junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Wilberto is the father of one child, age 11, whom he supports in his education, among other expenses.  Wilberto works as a lathe operator in a workshop and his wife runs a small convenience store in their home.  

Wilberto wants to add a pebbledash surface to the walls and floor of the humble home that, with great effort and sacrifice, he has been building in stages.  With the loan he is asking for, he will be able to buy materials such as cement and sand, and pay for the labor.  This will improve, bit by bit, the living conditions of him and his family.

loans.use: to buy materials such as cement and sand, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy small animals.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: Ana Paula 40 años de edad casada con un hijo aún menor de edad y bajo su responsabilidad, originaria de uno de los municipios de Chinandega zona ubicada en el occidente del país, se caracteriza por ser una mujer responsable, trabajadora, con muchos deseos de superación personal, ella se dedica a la elaboración de comidas de las cuales entrega en distintas instituciones del estado al igual que a clientes fijos y eventuales, también realiza para ocasiones especiales como: cumpleaños, bodas y eventos especiales y también elabora alimentos para venderlos en su fritanga, negocio que establece en su casa de habitación por las tardes,el objetivo de este crédito es para la compra de insumos para la elaboración de las deliciosas comidas secas, sopas, fritangas que ella realiza. para aprovechar la temporada alta de fin de año y además ampliando su clientela. Ana Paula agradece mucho el apoyo que los inversionistas kivas les ofrece a personas de bajos recursos económicos.
texts.en:
40-year old Ana Paula is married with a young son to raise. She was born in one of the municipalities of Chinandega located in the west of the country. 

Ana Paula is known for her sense of responsibility, for being a hard worker, and for her wish to get on in life. She makes food which she delivers to different institutions as well as to regular and occasional customers. She also caters special events such as birthdays, weddings etc. and makes food to sell in her fast food outlet, a business she runs out of her home in the afternoons. The goal of the loan is to buy ingredients for the delicious food that Ana Paula makes such as soups and fried items for the end of year festivities. She hopes to increase her customer base in this way.

She is very grateful to Kiva donors for the money they lend to low income people.

loans.use: Buy ingredients and supplies for making and selling food

loans.name: Leonisa

texts.en:
Leonisa is married and she works hard to support her family.

She has a charcoal sales business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising livestock and running her general store businesses. Leonisa is borrowing PHP 29,500 through NWTF in order to buy more stocks of charcoal for her charcoal business.

Leonisa has been sustaining her business activities through her past twenty-two loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Lina

texts.en:
Lina is 62 years old, married and has five children, one of whom is in school.

Lina is in the agricultural business, farming sugarcane in the Philippines. Lina has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Lina has been farming sugarcane for 14 years now, and has borrowed 19 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Lina would like to save money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: David

texts.es: David es un joven emprendedor de 21 años de edad que, desde hace 4 años se dedica a laborar en el campo de la belleza, obtuvo los conocimientos en un curso de barbería que realizó en una academia y, desde entonces trabajó en varias barberías de la ciudad pero, con el ánimo de generar más ingresos y ser independiente, tomó la iniciativa de montar su propia peluquería y barbería, ya lleva 18 meses en funcionamiento, trabajando diariamente en una jornada de 9:00 am a 8:00 pm, generando así, los ingresos económicos necesarios para aportar a la economía de su hogar. Su energía y dinamismo le han permitido lograr sus objetivos y actualmente encuentra en el crédito el apoyo que requiere para hacer crecer su negocio; con el dinero comprará un tocador con espejo y una silla de peluquería; así podrá tener un puesto más con el cual podrá generar una oportunidad de empleo y además podrá prestar un servicio más ágil a sus clientes, dando como resultado un incremento en sus ventas y en los ingresos. David manifiesta su interés por seguir trabajando con disciplina y dedicación para enfrentar los diversos problemas que le ocasionan los enfrentamientos entre bandas criminales del sector, que hacen que las personas teman salir a la calle; sin embargo esto no lo detiene, ya que él lucha por su sueños, en especial el de hacer crecer su negocio y generar más oportunidades de empleo, para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia, como la de los que se involucran en su labor.
texts.en:
David is an enterprising 21 year old young man who has been working in the beauty industry for four years.  He learned this after having taken a beauty course at an academy and he has worked in several barber shops in town since then, but he decided to start his own, so he could be on his own and earn more.  He has been in business for 18 months and works from 9:00 am to 9:00 pm and generates the income he needs to sustain his household.  His energy and dynamism have allowed him to reach his goals and this loan will help him grow his business.  He will use the money to buy a dresser and chair for the barber shop.  In this way he will be able to have a better shop where he can provide jobs for others, provide better service to his customers, and increase his income.

David says that he would like to keep working and face different challenges he faces, including bands of criminals in the area, who make people fear going out.  But, this does not keep him from working toward his dreams, especially growing his business and generating more employment, so he can improve his family’s living conditions and those of whom are involved in this work.

loans.use: to buy barber furniture.

loans.name: Noel

texts.es:
Noel de 38 años de edad, estudio hasta 3º grado, es casado, su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, sus 3 hijos viven con él, ya que son menores de edad.

Él, por su parte se dedica al trabajo de la carpintería, trabajo que aprendió a la edad de 18 años; también desempeña la  albañilería y hacer viajes en un camión.

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para reparar el camión, ya que se le ha dañado una parte del motor el cual necesita repararlo; porque del trabajo del camión percibe algunos ingresos para el sustento de su hogar.

Él piensa darles el estudio a sus hijos y puedan sacar una carrera universitaria, comprar un mototaxi y aumentar los ingresos para cubrir las necesidades de su familia.
texts.en:
38-year old Noel is married and has a grade 3 education. His wife works as a servant. Their three children live with them as they are still young. Noel is a carpenter, a trade he learned when he was 18 years old. He also works in construction and undertakes trips in his truck.

The loan Noel is seeking is to repair his truck since part of the engine is damaged and needs to be repaired. The money he earns from his transportation business helps pay for household expenses.

In the future he hopes to pay for his children's education so they can go to university, to buy a motorbike taxi, and to increase his income so he can pay for his family's needs.

loans.use: Repair the engine of his truck which has been damaged

loans.name: Saira

texts.en:
Saira, a 30 year old married woman, mother of 2 sons and 3 daughters, is living in Lahore, Pakistan. She is an independent and hard working woman. Her husband is a carpenter by profession, running his furniture shop. For the last twelve years. as a requirement of circumstances, her husband has been working hard (16 hours, in day and night) to meet the needs of his family and to cover the cost of his children's education. He is knowledgeable in making furniture. As a result, his clients always appreciate his work. 

Saira has requested for a loan, from KIVA partner BRAC Pakistan, to purchase some raw material for her husband's furniture shop as her family has already run short of funding. By taking the loan, she can expand her husband's furniture shop by investing. Her biggest dream is to move forward so that she can lead a better life with dignity.

loans.use: to pay for buy raw material for making furniture.

loans.name: Nigora

texts.ru: Нигора молодая и жизнерадостная женщина. Она не замужем и живет с родителями. Она родилась в 1994 году. Нигора умеет шить женские платья. Она решила организовать свой бизнес. Нигора участвовала в курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованного Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Нигора запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки швейной машинки. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Nigora is a young and happy woman. She is not married and lives with her parents. She was born in 1994. 

Nigora knows how to sew women's dresses. She decided to set up her own business. Nigora participated in the training "To Get Ahead", organized by the Association of Business Women, and she received a certificate. 

Nigora requests a loan in the amount of 2,000 somoni to purchase a sewing machine. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine for setting up a new business

loans.name: Asliddin

texts.ru: Аслиддин родился в сельской местности. Он добросовестный и порядочный человек. Аслиддину 32 года. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Аслиддин является основным кормильце семьи так как его жена домохозяйка и занимается воспитанием детей. Аслиддин живет вместе с родителями. Его родители старые люди. Аслиддин как и другие местные жители занимается скотоводством. Он этим бизнесом занимается уже более 8 лет. Аслиддин откармливает скот дома. Аслиддин планирует купить скот для последующей реализации. Так как Аслиддин не имеет достаточно денег, он обратился за займом в сумму 4000 сомони для покупки скота. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Asliddin was born in a village. He is a honest and decent man. Asliddin is 32 years old. He is married and raising three children. Asliddin is the main bread-winner in the family, as his wife is a housewife and raises the children. Asliddin lives together with his parents. His parents are old. 

Like the other residents of the village, Asliddin works with livestock breeding. He has worked in this business for eight years already. Asliddin fattens cattle at his house. Asliddin plans to purchase cattle for reselling. As he does not have sufficient money for this, he applied for a loan in the amount of 4,000 somoni to purchase cattle. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle to sell

loans.name: Norma Elizabeth

texts.es:
La Señora Norma forma parte del grupo de crédito Mujeres con Decisión, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad goza de mucha belleza natural como colonial, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad,  sus pueblos como su gente aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones.
La Señora. Norma tiene 38 años de edad, está casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 18 y 10 años, su primer hijo ingresa a la universidad y su segundo hijo estudia en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo labora como empleado público, la casa es propia.
Doña Norma se dedica a la atención de su bazar, actividad que le da la oportunidad de repartir su tiempo con sus estudios ya que esta cerca de graduarse en la carrera de Nutrición, tiene tiempo para estar con sus hijos y a su vez aportar económicamente para la superación de su hogar.
El dinero de su crédito anterior lo invirtió en la compra de bisutería y su nuevo crédito es para comprar productos de bazar para su negocio. Su grupo de crédito le gusta por la gran amistad que existe entre cada una de las socias y por el apoyo que reciben.
texts.en:
Señora Norma is part of the Mujeres con Decisión credit group.  She lives in the city of Cuenca.  This city enjoys a lot of natural beauty.  As a colonial city, it has been a World Heritage site since December 1999.  Its neighborhoods, as well as its people, still keep up their culture and traditions.

Señora Norma is 38 years old.  She is married and with her husband has two children, ages 18 and 10.  Her first child is enrolled in college and her second child studies in a little school in the city.  Her husband works as a public employee.  Their house is their own.

Doña Norma works taking care of her variety shop.  This job allows her to divide her time with her studies, because she is almost ready to graduate with a degree in Nutrition.  She has time to be with her children and, at the same time, lend a hand financially to improve her home.

She invested the money from her previous loan in the purchase of costume jewelry.  Her new loan to is buy items for her variety shop.  She likes her credit group because of the great friendships that exist between each of the members, and for the support that they receive.

loans.use: to buy products for her variety shop

loans.name: Anita Lucia

texts.es:
La Señora. Anita forma parte del grupo de crédito Mujeres con Visión, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad goza de mucha belleza natural como colonial, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad,  sus pueblos como la gente aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones.
La Señora Anita tiene 55 años de edad, es una mujer casada y fruto de esa unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos mayores de edad, tres de ellos son casados y viven independientes, su hijo soltero estudia en la universidad y también se dedica a trabajar. Su esposo es de profesión fotógrafo, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de una de sus hijas.
Doña Anita desde hace muchos años se dedica al arte de la fotografía, actividad que le gusta y la aprendió por su esposo y ahora es toda una profesional en la materia, este trabajo le ha permitido aportar a la economía de su hogar, pasar con sus hijos cuando le necesitan y más aun ser su propio jefe. 
El dinero de su crédito anterior lo invirtió en una impresora de fotos que le ha sido de mucha utilidad. Su nuevo crédito va a  invertir en la entrada para comprar  filmadora de alta calidad. Su grupo de crédito le gusta por la solidaridad del grupo, compañerismo y unión.
texts.en:
Anita is part of  the "Mujeres con Visión" communal bank. She lives in Cuenca. This city enjoys both natural beauty and colonial architecture. It was designated as a World Heritage Site in 1999. It's inhabitants keep up their traditions and culture. 

Anita is 55 years old, married and has four children as a result of this union. Three of them are married and live independently. The single son studies at university and also works. Her husband is a professional photographer. They don't have their own home, but live in the house of a daughter. For many years now, Anita has worked in the art of photography, an activity she enjoys. She learned from her husband and is now very much a professional in the field. This work has allowed her to help support her family finances, take care of her children when needed and moreover be her own boss. 

The money from the last loan was invested in a photo printer with has been very useful. The new loan will be invested in buying a new high quality cine camera. She enjoys her communal bank for it's solidarity, company and unity.

loans.use: to buy a cine camera.

loans.name: Despertar (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Despertar está formado por 8 mujeres quienes viven en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, tiene varios lugares para disfrutar de la naturaleza, hacer deportes extremos y pasar en familia. Las socias son personas amables y gentiles que trabajan día a día para mejorar la situación económica de sus hogares para brindarles mayores oportunidades a sus familias. 
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señorita. Jessica, tiene 25 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos, vive en casa de su madre a quien le ayuda con en los gastos del hogar ya que la casa donde viven es arrendada.
Diña Jessica está trabajando como mesera en un local de comida, lleva 3 años en este trabajo y labora de miércoles a domingo. 
Su crédito es para iniciar su propio negocio el cual es venta de comida rápida, va a comprar víveres y espera crecer en el negocio. Su meta es terminar sus estudios del colegio.
texts.en:
The loan group Depertar (Awakening) is comprised of 8 women who live in the city of Cuenca. This city has been designated a World Heritage Site since December 1999. It has various places for enjoying nature, doing extreme sports, and spending time with family. The members are friendly and kind people who work day in and day out to improve their economic situation and their homes in order to give their families better opportunities. 
One of the members of this group is Jessica, who is 25 years old, single, and doesn't have children. She lives in her mother's house and she helps her with the household expenses as the house they live in is leased. 
Jessica works as a waitress in a local restaurant and has been doing this for 3 years. She works Wednesday to Sunday.
This loan will be used to start her own business selling fast food. She is going to buy food supplies and hopes to grow with the business. Her goal is to finish college.

loans.use: to buy food supplies.

loans.name: Alexander Joseth

texts.es: Alexander, tiene 20 años, es soltero, vive en casa familiar. Actualmente trabaja manejando una moto taxi en una empresa de su localidad, los sábados y domingos trabaja en su taller de mecánica, este sería su segundo crédito. Beneficiario utilizara el crédito para comprarse una moto lineal ya que los fines de semana alquila su moto taxi a un familiar y su taller mecánico es lejos.  Su sueño es que su taller de mecánica sea más grande y conocido.
texts.en: Alexander is 20 years old, single, and lives with his family. Currently, he works driving a three wheeled taxi for a local business. On Saturdays and Sundays he works in his own mechanic's shop. This will be his second loan. He will use the loan to buy a motorcycle because he rents his mototaxi to a family member at the weekends and his workshop is far from his home. His dream is to have a larger and well-known mechanic's shop.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike.

loans.name: Rokhaya

texts.fr: Madame Rokhaya est une commerçante de profession qui évolue dans l’achat et la vente des denrées alimentaires.  Elle est mariée et mère de famille qui aide son mari dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes et les frais de scolarité de ses enfants.  Elle sollicite ce montant  pour acheter des denrées alimentaires comme le riz, sucre, savon, huile etc…………pour ensuite les revendre à ses clients. Rokhaya commence sa journée à 8h pour la finir à 19h. Elle souhaite avoir une grande boutique d’alimentation générale pour voir le monopole dans  le marché.
texts.en: Mrs. Rokhaya is a businesswoman who works in the commerce of food products. She is married with children and she helps her husband to manage their daily expenses and school fees for her children. She requests this loan to buy food products such as rice, sugar, soap, oil, etc.... to then resell them to her customers. Rokhaya starts her day at 8 am and finishes at 7 pm. She would like to have a big grocery shop in order to have a monopoly on the market.

loans.use: To buy food products for resale.

loans.name: Sherly

texts.en:
Shirly is 58 years old and married. She has six children.

Shirly is in the agricultural business, farming sugarcane in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Shirly has been farming sugarcane for 22 years now, and has borrowed 13 times in the past from NWTF and more recently, from Kiva to sustain her efforts. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream, to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is married and she works hard to support her family.

She has a motorcycle repair business in the Philippines. Erlinda is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF in order to purchase raw materials for her shop.

Erlinda has been sustaining her business activities through her past 12 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for her shop.

loans.name: Rubina Group

texts.en:
Robina is a 31-years old hard working housewife. She is living in Lahore Pakistan with her husband, 2 daughters and 2 sons. Her husband is a security guard by profession but his monthly income is not enough to fulfill the household expenses of his family. Therefore, for the past 2 years, along with the profession of security guard, he also drives a rickshaw at night. 

Currently, Robina's husband is not able to generate any income from the Rickshaw, as its engine is not working properly and needs to be repaired. Robina, as part of 2-person lending group, has requested a loan from KIVA partner BRAC Pakistan to meet the amount needed to repair her husband's Rickshaw. With the profits, her husband wants to buy a taxi in the future. Robina desires to provide the quality of education for all of her children and she prays for the good health of her family and for the growth of her husband's business. She is very much thankful to Brac.

loans.use: to pay for Rickshaw repairs.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Hilda works hard to support her family. She has a rice retailing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming vegetables. Hilda is borrowing PHP 5,000, through NWTF, in order to purchase more stock to sell.

Hilda has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Rehana Group

texts.en:
Rehana is 46 years old hard working woman. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan with her husband, 2-sons and 4 daughters. All of her children are studying in school. Her husband owns a butcher shop in the main market which is the only source of income for their family. His monthly net income is insufficient to meet the family needs. Presently, he needs an additional capital to purchase bull calf to get meat. 

For that reason his wife, Rehana, as member of 2-person lending group, has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband. As their family expenditures are too much, as compared to the monthly income and savings. Rehana wants to open a new shop for her husband, with the profit amount. As a result of this, they can increase their monthly income as well as savings. Her dreams are for higher education for her children. She is very much thankful to Kiva for such a great help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy beef/bull calf to sell.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Julieta works hard to support her family. She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from selling recycled materials. Julieta is borrowing PHP 8,000 through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell to customers.

Julieta has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Mila Rose

texts.en:
Mila Rosa is 43 years old and married. She has four children. Mila Rosa works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Mila Rosa has borrowed and repaid two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns an income from farming sugarcane.

Mila Rosa aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Rukya Group

texts.en:
Rukya is a 31-year-old woman who is living in Lahore, Pakistan, with her husband. Her husband is a heart patient and she always worries about his health. 

For four years, her husband has run a blacksmith shop, which is the only source of income for their family.  

As a member of a two-person lending group, Rukya has requested a loan from Kiva partner, Brac Pakistan. Rukya will use her portion of the loan to help her husband in purchasing some materials and tools for his blacksmith shop. As they have no other source of income, with the help of this loan, her husband will be able to continue his business, and with the net profit, he will open a new shop for his son.

Rukya dreams for her children's bright future and prays for her husband's good health. She wants to say that Brac Pakistan is working very well in the field of microfinance and she is very thankful to Brac Pakistan and Kiva for helping her.

loans.use: to buy material and tools for her husband's blacksmith shop.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: José de 32 años de edad habita es soltero y habita en casa propia desde hace mucho tiempo. Él se dedica a la venta  de frutas y verduras en el mercado central de su localidad. Tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse al negocio por lo que ya cuenta con mucha clientela que cada día lo prefieren más. Desea invertir en su negocio en la compra de mayor cantidad de verduras y frutas ya que desea poder abarcar una mayor demanda de mercado y así aumentar sus ventas e ingresos. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para hacer la inversión ya que no cuenta con los recursos naturales para hacerlo por su cuenta.
texts.en: José is 32 years old. He is single and has lived in his own house for some time now. He sells fruit and vegetables in the central market of his community. He has done this business for a long time and has a lot of clients who prefer him. He wants to invest in buying a large quantity of vegetables and fruits as he wants to command a larger share of this market and increase his sales and revenues. So he has requested a loan from FUSAI to make this investment as he does not have the resources to do this on his own.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fruits and vegetables like tomatoes, potatoes, onions, watermelon, melons, apples, pineapple, etc.

loans.name: Yessica Lisseth

texts.es: Yessica de 24 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 6 años y 4 años de edad. Ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras en el mercado central de su localidad. Tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse al negocio por lo que ya cuenta con muchos clientes que cada día la prefieren más. Desea ampliar su negocio por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de variedad de frutas y verduras para satisfacer una mayor demanda de mercado y así mejorar sus ventas e ingresos  y por consecuencia su calidad de vida y la de su  familia.
texts.en: Yessica is 24 years old. She lives in her own house with her 4 and 6 year old children. She sells fruit and vegetables in the central market of her community. She has been doing this business for a long time and has many clients who prefer her. She wants to expand her business so she has requested a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying fruits and vegetables. She wants to fill a greater demand in the market and increase her sales and revenues. And as a consequence improve the quality of living for her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Fernando Antonio

texts.es: Fernando de 37 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 13 años y 5 años de edad. Fernando se gana la vida por medio de un pequeño negocio de pupusería (preparación alimenticia a base de masa de maíz, frijoles, queso, etc.) que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado establecer. Con el fin de mejorar sus ventas ha tomado la decisión de invertir en el negocio por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los insumos necesarios (maíz, frijoles, queso, gas propano, etc.) para la elaboración de las ricas pupusas.
texts.en: 37 year old Fernando lives in his own house along with his two children who are 13 and 5 years old. Fernando earns a living through his small business making pupusas (a dish made from corn paste, beans, cheese, etc) which he was able to establish thanks to his great efforts. With the goal of improving his sales, he has decided to invest in his business and for this he needs a loan from FUSAI so that he can buy the necessary supplies: corn, beans, cheese, gas, propane, etc) to make his delicious pupusas.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, cheese, gas, propane, etc.

loans.name: Janeth Milagros

texts.es: Janeth, tiene 21 años, es soltera, vive en casa familiar con su madre y su hijo de 2 años. Actualmente labora en una empresa agrícola de su localidad como jornalera. Beneficiaria utilizara el crédito para construir una parte de su casa, el cual quedo dañada por el terremoto, poco a poco junto con su madre están construyéndola. Este es su segundo crédito. Su sueño es estudiar la carrera de contabilidad y ser una gran profesional el cual le permita generar mayores ingresos para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Janeth, 21 years old, is single and lives in the family home with her mother and her 2 year old son. She currently works as a day laborer for an agricultural company in her area. 

She will use the loan for expanding her home which was damaged by an earthquake. Little by little she and her mother are building it. This is her second loan. Her dream is to study for an accounting degree and to be a valuable professional in order to generate better income to improve the quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to pay housing construction costs

loans.name: Erika Fernanda

texts.es:
La Señorita. Erika es socia del grupo de crédito Mujeres con Decisión, se encuentra en este grupo desde hace 2 años,  le gusta formar parte de este grupo por la solidaridad que existe, vive por la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad goza de belleza natural como colonial, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad,  sus pueblos como la gente aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones.
La Señorita. Erika tiene 20 años de edad es soltera, aun no ha concebido hijos, vive con sus padres quienes tienen casa propia y le apoyan para que se supere.
Doña Erika se dedica a estudiar en una universidad de la ciudad  la carrera de Medicina. 
El dinero de su crédito va a invertir en sus estudios, va a comprar algunos libros que le hacen falta. Su meta es graduarse y ser profesional.
texts.en:
Señorita Erika is a member of the Mujeres con Decisión communal bank.  She has been part of this group for two years.  She likes to be part of this group because of the solidarity that exists there.  She lives in the city of Cuenca.  This city enjoys great natural beauty.  As a colonial city, it has been a World Heritage site since December 1999.  Its neighborhoods, as well as its people, keep up their culture and traditions.

Señorita Erika is 20 years old.  She is single and doesn’t have any children.  She lives with her parents, who own their own home.  They support her so she can succeed.  Doña Erika spends her time studying Medicine in a university in the city.  She is going to invest the money from this loan in her studies; she will buy some books that she needs.  Her goal is to graduate and become a professional.

loans.use: to buy books.

loans.name: Gladys Sirley

texts.es:
Gladys, a sus 43 años de edad, se dedica a atender su propio negocio de comidas rápidas, oficio que inició hace aproximadamente un año debido a la necesidad de generar recursos económicos para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar y con el sustento de sus 4 hijos. El capital para el negocio surgió de unos ahorros que poseía una sobrina que llegó de la costa a vivir con ellos, quien se ofreció a apoyarla para salir adelante como socias; con el dinero compraron algunos utensilios de cocina e insumos y poco a poco fueron creciendo, allí ofrecen todo tipo de comidas rápidas, jugos y gaseosas.
El crédito que solicita actualmente es para invertirlo en la compra de una licuadora, una caneca plástica, un televisor, y una plancha para preparar las comidas; esto le permitirá aumentar su capacidad de producción y estará más preparada para atender sus clientes, con un servicio más ágil y de excelente calidad, esto le ayudará a mejorar las ventas y los ingresos que percibe con la labor.
Gladys manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es fortalecer su negocio y en un futuro cercano, ampliarlo para ser más competitiva en el mercado y lograr permanencia y reconocimiento; esto le ayudará a mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Gladys, age 43, has her own fast food business.  She started this work approximately one year ago.  She did so out of to the need to generate financial resources in order to help her husband with the household expenses and to support their four children.

The money for the business came from the savings that a niece, who came from the coast to live with them, offered in order to help her get ahead as partners.  They used the money to buy some kitchen utensils and supplies.  Little by little, they were growing.  In their business they offer all types of fast food, juices, and soft drinks.

The loan that she is now requesting is to buy a blender, a plastic barrel, a television, and a griddle to prepare the food.  This will allow her to increase her production capacity.  She will also be more prepared to tend to her customers with quicker, excellent quality service.  This will help her to improve the sales and the income that she gets from her work.

Gladys says that her biggest desire is to strengthen her business.  In the near future she wants to expand it in order to be more competitive in the market and to achieve stability and recognition in the market.  This will help her to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a blender, a plastic barrel, a television, and a griddle to prepare the food.

loans.name: Nubia Del Socorro

texts.es:
Nubia, a sus 64 años de edad sigue luchando para sacar adelante a sus dos hijos, pues es madre cabeza de hogar y toda la responsabilidad económica recae sobre ella, luego de haberse separado de su ex esposo. Desde muy joven aprendió el oficio de la modistería y, perfeccionó su técnica y sus conocimientos mientras trabajaba en diferentes talleres de confección; luego de algunos años, cuando ya tuvo el capital suficiente para independizarse, adquirió sus propias máquinas e inició su taller, en el que ofrece el servicio de confección a terceros y además produce algunas prendas de línea propia; esto le ha generado los recursos económicos suficientes para solventar las necesidades básicas de su hogar.
Con el ánimo de fortalecer su actividad, solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar telas, hilos, agujas para las máquinas, entre otros; esto le permitirá tener disponibilidad de insumos para poder cumplir con las producciones que tiene pendientes para la temporada escolar que comienza, en la que su trabajo se incrementa, al igual que sus ingresos.
Nubia tiene como propósito principal, fortalecer su negocio y convertirlo en una microempresa competitiva, en la que pueda generar oportunidades de empleo y así garantizar una estabilidad económica que le permita dar a sus hijos una mejor educación y calidad de vida.
texts.en:
64 year old Nubia keeps working hard to bring up her two children. She is a mother and head of the household and all the economic responsibilities have fallen on her since she separated from her ex-husband. When she was very young, she learned to be a dressmaker and she perfected her technique and her knowledge while working in different sewing workshops. After some years, when she had enough capital to be independent, she bought her own machines and started her workshop where she offers her dressmaking skills to others and also produces her own line of clothes. This has generated enough income to cover the basic household expenses. 
In an effort to strengthen her business, she is requesting a loan to buy fabric, thread, sewing machine needles, and other things. This will enable her to have the supplies available to meet the orders she has for the school year that is about to start, so that her work increases as well as her income. 
Nubia's main purpose is to strengthen her business and turn it into a competitive micro enterprise that can generate employment opportunities and guarantee the economic stability that will enable her to giver her children a better education and quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, sewing machine needles, and other things.

loans.name: Lizbeth

texts.es: Lizbeth, de 37 años, es una mujer empeñosa y muy trabajadora, está casada y tiene 4 hijos, vive junto a toda su familia en una cómoda casa que alquila por un pago mensual, desde ahí trabaja todos los días para mejorar su ingresos económicos y poder tener una mejor calidad de vida. El trabajo de Lizbeth, consiste en la venta de cosméticos, vende todo tipo de artículos mediante el sistema de venta por catálogo o exhibición, tiene una vitrina en su casa en donde llegan sus clientes en busca de perfumes, talcos, cremas, desodorantes o algún accesorio de utilidad. Lleva en esta actividad un poco más de 4 años, trabaja sola y gana muy bien. Por lo pronto, continúa trabajando en la venta de cosméticos y le gusta lo que hace, afirma que sus ganancias económicas están aseguradas con los clientes que ya ha logrado consolidar con el paso de los años. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1000, por tanto agradece la oportunidad que le brindan para acceder al crédito que necesita para continuar con el logro de sus metas. Con el monto solicitado comprará principalmente cosméticos como talcos, cremas, perfumes y otros accesorios.
texts.en:
Lizbeth, 37, is a persevering and very hardworking woman.  She's married and has four children, and lives with the whole family in a comfortable house she rents monthly.  She works there every day to improve her income and quality of life.

Lizbeth's job is selling cosmetics.  She sells all types of products by catalogue or show.  She has a display case in her house where customers look for perfume, talcum powder, creams, deodorant, or some accessory.  She has been in this job for a little more than four years.  She works alone and makes a good living, so she continues working in the field and she likes what she does.  She says her profits are guaranteed with her current customers because over time she has managed to become established.

Currently Lizbeth's requesting 1,000 soles [PEN] to buy mainly cosmetics such as talcum powder, lotions, perfume, and other useful accessories.  She's grateful for this opportunity to get the loan she needs to keep on achieving her goals.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and accessories

loans.name: Aminata

texts.fr: Elle s’appelle AMINATA et évolue dans le commerce des légumes. Elle est à son 6ème prêt  et sollicite ce dernier pour acheter des marchandises et des légumes destinés à la vente. AMINATA est marié et mère de famille. Elle a une expérience de plus de 20ans dans cette activité et gère les dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille. Elle commence sa journée à 9h pour la terminer à 18h. A l’avenir elle souhaite épargner de l’argent et améliorer les conditions alimentaires de sa famille, ainsi elle voudrait avoir une cantine au niveau du marché afin de pouvoir diversifier ses produits et augmenter ses revenus.
texts.en: Her name is Aminata and she sells vegetables. This is her sixth loan and she requests this one for the purchase of products and vegetables for resale. Aminata is married with children. She has over 20 years' experience in this business and manages her family's daily expenses. She starts her day at 9am and finishes at 6pm. In the future she hopes to save up money and improve her family's dietary conditions. She would like to have a cafeteria in the market in order to diversify her products and increase her income.

loans.use: To buy and sell vegetables.

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en:
Angelita is 51 years, married and blessed with four children. She earns a living by raising pigs. Angelita is borrowing a loan amounting to PHP 3,000 to buy additional sacks of feeds, medicines and vitamins. 

Angelita has been raising pigs for over seven years and earns additional income from farming. She is working tirelessly toward the improvement of her family's status of living. She hopes that her business will continue to grow to earn more income.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of feeds, medicines and vitamins.

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora is 40 years old and married with four children. With four children in school, Leonora works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to buy more goods like canned goods, shampoo, laundry soap, coffee, sugar, etc., to sell.   

She has been in this business for 15 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, shampoo, laundry soap, coffee, sugar, etc. 

Leonora would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more goods like canned goods, shampoo, laundry soap, coffee, sugar, etc., to sell

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
As a married mother of six children, Melanie works hard to support her family. She has a tricycle transportation business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from selling frozen foods. Melanie is borrowing PHP 6,000 through NWTF in order to buy spare parts for her tricycle.

Melanie has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for her tricycle.

loans.name: Rhodora

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Rhodora works hard to support her family. She has a rice retailing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from selling firewood. Rhodora is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF in order to purchase more stocks of rice to sell.

Rhodora has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith is 32 years old and married. She has five children. She works hard to provide for her family. Judith runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks to sell in her general store.

Judith has borrowed and repaid 2 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 5 years and also earns additional income from food vending. She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks to sell in her general store.

loans.name: July Ann

texts.en:
July Ann is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. She is 25 years old and has two children who are in school.

July Ann has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 5,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell. July Ann has been in this business for 5 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 23 años de edad vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos en casa propia, pero no poseen luz eléctrica, ella se dedica a la venta de pan dulce y pan frances lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, la clienta está solicitando un crédito para la compra de una lámpara solar que es la que muestra en la fotografía ya que en la comunidad donde ella reside nadie posee luz eléctrica y con lo que gana no le alcanza para poder realizarlo, la lámpara es una estación de carga con energía de paneles solares en forma de lámpara que sirve para los hogares de zonas rurales donde no poseen energía eléctrica, con esta compra se podrán beneficiar con su familia ya que por las noches podrán tener luz propia.
texts.en:
The client is 23 years old, and lives with her husband and their two children in their own home.  They do not have electricity.  She works on foot, selling pan dulce [sweet bread] and French bread in the different neighborhoods near her home. 

The client is seeking a loan for the purchase of a solar lamp, which is shown in the photograph. No one in her community has electric light, and with what she earns, she cannot afford it either.  The lamp is a charging station with solar energy panels that form a light, which is used to serve homes in rural areas that do not have electricity.

This purchase will be beneficial to her and her family, as they will be able to have their own light at night.

loans.use: to purchase a solar lamp.

loans.name: Loikjon

texts.ru: Лоикчон молодой и энергичный молодой человек. Он родился в 1985 году. Лоикчон женат и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Он является единственным кормильцем своей семьи, так как его жена домохозяйка и занимается воспитанием детей. Он занимается собственным бизнесом. Лоикчон мастер по ремонту авто. Он ремонтирует трактор, камаз, легковые автомашины и т.п. Лоикчон дополнительно имеет свой трактор и сдает в аренду и получает за аренду деньги. Его трактор сломался и Лоикчон должен отремонтировать свой трактор. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 2900 сомони для ремонта трактора. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Loikjon is an energetic young man. He was bornin1985. Loikjon is married and raising three children. He is the only breadwinner in the family since his wife is a homemaker and dedicates herself to raising their chidren. Loikjon has his own buisness. He is a car mechanic. He repairs tractors, Kamaz brand trucks, passenger cars etc. In addition, he owns a tractor which he leases out for a fee. His tractor is broken, and Loikjon needs to repair it. He is requesting a loan in the amount of 2900 TJS to repair his tractor. He is counting on your kindness and hopes for your compassion.

loans.use: To repair his tractor

loans.name: Mirian

texts.es: La señora Miriam de 36 años de edad vive en una zona céntrica, con sus hermanos y es soltera, cuenta con un grado de instrucción de nivel profesional como Pedagoga y tiene 1 hijo dependiente de su ingresos, que necesita mucho cuidado por lo mismo dejo de ejercer su profesión, ya que anteriormente trabajaba en una institución, ahora se dedica al comercio de en una tienda de barrio,  con una antigüedad de 4 años de experiencia en el rubro, trabaja de lunes a sábados, además tiene un punto viva conformado por 3 cabinas telefónicas las cuales le generan más ingresos ya que su tienda está ubicada en un lugar muy concurrido de la ciudad. Pero ahora no cuenta con los recursos suficientes, por ello solicita un crédito para la compra de productos y materiales para su tienda, así podrá ofrecer más variedad y lograra incrementar aún más sus ganancias para proporcionarle a su hijo mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Miriam, 36 years old, is single and lives in a central area with her children. She has a professional degree in Education and she has one son who is dependent on her income, who needs a lot of care from her. For this reason she stopped working in her field. She used to work in a high school, and now she works in retail in a neighborhood store. She has four years of experience in this work. She works Mondays through Saturdays, and she also has a connection point in the form of three telephone booths, which generate more income since her store is located in a busy part of the city. 

But now she does not have sufficient resources, so she is requesting a loan for the purchase of products and materials for her store. This way she can offer more variety and increase her profits even more, to offer her son a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy products and materials for her store

loans.name: Oscar Antonio

texts.es:
Oscar  de 34 años de edad,  es un hombre muy dedicado a su familia, vive junto con su compañera de vida y sus 2 hijos de 3 y 5 años de edad, quienes están estudiando en la escuela.

Oscar se dedica al trabajo de soldadura, mecánica y  albañilería, estos trabajos los aprendió de un amigo, ya que trabajaban juntos en la capital. Hoy en día trabaja bajo contratos, para hacer todo tipo de trabajo. Su compañera de vida, se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catálogo, es de esa forma que van saliendo adelante con sus hijos.

Con el préstamo se estará ayudando al cliente, para que pueda instalar la energía eléctrica,  ya que no salió beneficiado con un proyecto que se dio en la comunidad, porque no tenía casa, pero hoy ya la construyo y quiere solventar esa gran necesidad que tiene en su casa suya. 

Su sueño es tener una casa, mucho más grande y bien amueblada.
texts.en:
34 year old Oscar is a man who is very dedicated to his family. He lives with his partner and their 2 children who are 3 and 5 years old and who are in school.  
Oscar is a welder, mechanic, and bricklayer, and he learned these trades from a friend when they worked together in the capital. Today, he works as a contractor, doing all types of work. His partner works selling beauty products from a catalog. This is how they are able to support their children. 
This loan will help Oscar to install electricity supply as he was not able to benefit from a community electricity project as he didn't have a house at the time. But, now he has built one and wants to resolve this great need in his home. 
His dream is to have a much bigger and well furnished house.

loans.use: to install electric power in his house.

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es:
Miguel es un joven de 21 años de edad, muy emprendedor, a pesar de su corta edad se ha ido convirtiendo poco a poco en micro-empresario. Actualmente, vive solo con su madre quien le ayuda a vender, cuando él sale a comprar más productos.

Miguel comenzó a vender pan, en toda la zona desde  hace 7 años, hoy en día, el joven ya tiene un pequeño negocio establecido donde vende bebidas, golosinas, pan y películas.  

Con el préstamo se estará ayudando al cliente, para surtir más la tienda con productos como: pan, golosinas, galletas, dulces y bebidas.

Su sueño es tener un negocio muy fuerte, ya que empezara invirtiendo poco a poco en productos varios, para satisfacer los deseos de compra de los clientes.
texts.en: Miguel is a young man of 21 who despite his youth is very entrepreneurial and has converted little by little into a micro-businessman. Presently he lives alone with his mother who helps him sell when he goes out to buy more product. Seven years ago Miguel started by selling bread throughout his area. Today he has a small established business where he sells drinks, sweets, bread and films.The loan will help this client by stocking his store with more products like bread, sweets, biscuits, candy and drinks. His dream is to have a robust business and he has started to invest little by little in various products to meet the needs of his clients.

loans.use: to stock his store with products like bread, sweets, biscuits, candy and drinks.

loans.name: Freddy

texts.es: El señor Freddy tiene 27 años de edad vive solo ya que no tiene esposa ni hijos dependientes, en el municipio de Monteagudo. Su principal actividad es el trabajo de albañil realizando obras de construcción de viviendas y otros tipos, trabaja arduamente para cubrir sus gastos de alimentación, ropa, servicios básicos y otros en los que incurre su hogar. Actualmente solicita un crédito para la compra de una mescladora y herramientas de trabajo, ya que con todo esto podrá trabajar con sus propios equipos y y ofrecerá un resultado más eficiente con el fin de obtener mayores ingresos y mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Freddy is 27 years old and lives alone, since he has niether a wife nor dependent children, in the municipality of Monteagudo. His principal activity is working as a brick layer, constructing houses and other types of buildings. Freddy works hard in order to cover the costs of food, clothing, basic services and other expenses his home incurs.

Now, he is requesting a loan to purchase a cement mixer and additional work tools, which will enable him to work with his own equipment and offer more efficient resuits. This will bring in better income and improve his conditions of life.

loans.use: to buy a cement mixer and masonry tools.

loans.name: Agustin Ruben

texts.es: Agustín, tiene 26 años, es soltero, vive en casa familiar con sus padres. Actualmente trabaja en una empresa de construcción de su localidad como operario en la manipulación de carga pesada, paralelamente estudia en la Universidad. Beneficiario utilizará el crédito para compra de televisor y cocina para su hogar, esto le permitirá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Su sueño es ser Ingeniero Civil, tener su propia empresa de construcción.
texts.en: Agustín is 26 years old. He is single and lives in the family house with his parents. He works for a local construction firm as an operator of equipment moving heavy cargo. At the same time he studies at university. He will use the loan to purchase a TV set and a stove for his house, allowing his family to enjoy a higher quality of living. His dream is to be a civil engineer and have his own construction firm.

loans.use: to buy a TV and a stove.

loans.name: Lindaura Yasileth

texts.es:
Lindaura es una mujer muy trabajadora de 30 años de edad, a pesar de tener pequeños sus 2 hijos,  ha sabido enfrentar la vida con coraje y mucho trabajo. Actualmente vive con su compañero de vida y sus 2 niños uno de 5 y 1 año de edad. 

Lindaura vende productos de belleza por catálogo, donde saca sus pequeños ingresos, además tiene la experiencia en fotografía, y aunque es eventual el trabajo, lo desempeña muy bien. La otra actividad que realiza, es la venta de ropa en los cantones.
Con el préstamo se le estará ayudando al cliente, para que pueda comprar sus productos de belleza y ropa, para salir a vender con más productos, porque tiene muchos clientes a los que les provee. 

Su sueño es tener un negocio muy fuerte en la zona, ya que ha encontrado un mercado muy aceptable para con sus productos.
texts.en:
Lindaura is a hardworking woman, age 30.  In spite of having two young children, she has been known to take on life with courage and a lot of work.  She currently lives with her partner and her two children, ages 1 and 5.

Lindaura gets her small income from selling beauty products from a catalog.  She also has experience in photography. Although the work is sporadic, she does it well.  The other job that she does is selling clothing in the neighborhoods.

She is going to be helping her customers with this loan, so that they can buy her beauty products and clothing.  She’ll be able to go out with more products, because she has lots of customers to supply.

Her dream is to have a strong business in the area, because she has found a market that is a good fit for her products.

loans.use: to buy beauty products and clothing, to go out to sell with other products, because she has lots of customers to take care of.

loans.name: Queren Yined

texts.es:
Des de muy pequeña había tenido la ilusión de estudiar diseño, ya que la mama le regalo una maquina de cocer de juguete y con esta fue dando creación a los primeros vestidos para las muñecas, se gano regaños porque a medida de que crecía las camisas las descocía y las volvía a cocer dándole el toque personal.
Con este técnico que esta terminando piensa que es la puerta para ir escalando e ir cumpliendo los sueños poco a poco e ir conociendo mas sobre el tema para poder llegar a ser una diseñadora de excelencia, y ser orgullo para la familia que siempre la han apoyado y le han dado el empuje para seguir adelante y cumplir las metas.
En 5 o 10 años se ve dando comienzo a la propia marca de ropa de ella, creando a si futuros empleos y empuje a las personas que desean crear su propia empresa, le gustaría diseños que muestren la belleza de la tierra ya que el país de ella tiene muchas inspiraciones tanto de la gente como de la naturaleza.
Escogió esta carrera porque sabe que no solo elabora ropa, si no que da creación a ideas valiosas que pueden dar un nuevo punto de vista para la moda, para todo tipo de gente, no solo es diseñar si no tener gusto , pasión por lo que hace, haciéndolo bien y teniendo ética y buen desempeño en el diseño que se realiza.
texts.en:
From a very young age, Queren has had the dream of studying design, because her mom gave her a toy sewing machine. With this she created the first dresses for her dolls. She earned scoldings because as she grew up, she would take apart her shirts and re-sew them, giving them her personal touch.

With these skills she thinks that it is her door to keep moving up and making her dreams come true little by little.  She can go on learning more about the subject in order to come to be a designer of excellence.  She can be proud for her family who have always supported her and given her a push to get ahead and reach her goals.

In five or ten years she sees herself launching her own line of women’s clothing, and in this way making jobs and pushing other people who want to start their own companies.  She would like styles that show off the beauty of the world, because her country offers a lot of inspiration in its people, as well as in nature.

She chose this major because she knows that more than making clothing, she is creating valuable ideas that can give fashion a new point of view for all types of people.  It is not just designing, but is also having taste and passion for what she does, doing it well and having good ethics and performance in the designs that she makes.

loans.use: to pay for one semester's registration fees.

loans.name: Reina De La Paz

texts.es:
Reina, tiene 56 años de edad, es casada, tiene dos hijos de 23 y 27 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos, se dedica a atender su negocio que consiste en el cultivo de maíz y en su casa tiene una tienda que ofrece a sus clientes productos de primera necesidad, con estas actividades económicas genera los ingresos necesarios para cubrir los gastos de su hogar, por su experiencia no ha tenido ningún problema en administrar su negocio.
Con el préstamo comprara abono, fertilizantes, insecticidas, jabón, azúcar, arroz, golosinas, etc., con lo que tendrá lo necesario para cultivar maíz y fortalecer más la tienda, espera atraer nuevos clientes, tener un inventario muy surtido, aumentar sus ventas y mejorar sus ingresos.
Anhela tener un negocio más rentable y cambiar el estilo de vida familiar que por el momento tiene ella y los demás miembros de su hogar.
texts.en:
Reina is 56, married, and has two children aged 23 and 27. She lives with her husband and their children. She she has a business growing maize and she also runs a shop in her home that offers basic items for her customers. In this way, she generates the necessary income to cover the household costs, and she has never experienced any problems running her business.

Reina is asking for this loan to buy items such as manure, fertilisers, insecticides, soap, sugar, rice and sweets. With this she will have all she needs to grow maize and to build up her shop. She hopes to attract new customers, have a very well-stocked inventory, increase her sales and improve her income. She dreams of having a more profitable business and of changing the style of family life they currently have.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilisers, insecticides, soap, sugar, rice and sweets.

loans.name: Elena Arely

texts.es:
Elena, disfruta de ver crecer a su hijo de 4 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene la responsabilidad de darle a su hijo lo necesario para crecer en un ambiente sano. Para cubrir los gastos de su hogar ella por iniciativa propia emprendió su negocio que consiste en atender y administrar un comedor, el cual está abierto al público desde las 7:00 a.m. a 3:00 p.m., no es un negocio que se le dificulte administrarlo.
Invertirá en la compra carnes, verduras, condimentos, bebidas, y otros ingredientes necesarios para elaborar los diferentes platos de comida que ofrece a sus clientes, espera atraer a nuevos clientes, aumentar ventas, tener mejores ingresos, y dar un mejor servicio.
Sueña con ampliar su negocio, mejorar la economía, cancelar sus deudas, dar a su hijo salud, alimentación y salud de calidad.
texts.en:
Elena enjoys watching her 4 year old son grow, She is a single mother and it is her responsibility to give her son what he needs to grow in a safe environment. To cover the expenses of her household she started her business on her own initiative. She runs a cafe which is open to the public from 7 am until 3 pm. It is not difficult to manage.

Elena will invest the loan purchasing meats, vegetables, condiments, drinks and other ingredients she needs to make the different meals offered to her customers. She wants to attract new clients, increase her sales and revenues and offer better service.
